name: Bulbasaur
descriptionX: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
descriptionY: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.

name: Ivysaur
descriptionX: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
descriptionY: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.

name: Venusaur
descriptionX: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
descriptionY: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.

name: Mega Venusaur
descriptionX: In order to support its flower, which has grown larger due to Mega Evolution, its back and legs have become stronger.
descriptionY: In order to support its flower, which has grown larger due to Mega Evolution, its back and legs have become stronger.

name: Gigantamax Venusaur
descriptionX: In battle, this Pokémon swings around two thick vines. If these vines slammed into a 10-story building, they could easily topple it.
descriptionY: Huge amounts of pollen burst from it with the force of a volcanic eruption. Breathing in too much of the pollen can cause fainting.

name: Charmander
descriptionX: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
descriptionY: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.

name: Charmeleon
descriptionX: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
descriptionY: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.

name: Charizard
descriptionX: It is said that Charizard’s fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.
descriptionY: It is said that Charizard’s fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.

name: Mega Charizard X
descriptionX: The overwhelming power that fills its entire body causes it to turn black and creates intense blue flames.
descriptionY: The overwhelming power that fills its entire body causes it to turn black and creates intense blue flames.

name: Mega Charizard Y
descriptionX: Its bond with its Trainer is the source of its power. It boasts speed and maneuverability greater than that of a jet fighter.
descriptionY: Its bond with its Trainer is the source of its power. It boasts speed and maneuverability greater than that of a jet fighter.

name: Gigantamax Charizard
descriptionX: This colossal, flame-winged figure of a Charizard was brought about by Gigantamax energy.
descriptionY: The flame inside its body burns hotter than 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit. When Charizard roars, that temperature climbs even higher.

name: Squirtle
descriptionX: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.
descriptionY: When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.

name: Wartortle
descriptionX: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.
descriptionY: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.

name: Blastoise
descriptionX: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.
descriptionY: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.

name: Mega Blastoise
descriptionX: The cannon on its back is as powerful as a tank gun. Its tough legs and back enable it to withstand the recoil from firing the cannon.
descriptionY: The cannon on its back is as powerful as a tank gun. Its tough legs and back enable it to withstand the recoil from firing the cannon.

name: Gigantamax Blastoise
descriptionX: It’s not very good at precision shooting. When attacking, it just fires its 31 cannons over and over and over.
descriptionY: Water fired from this Pokémon’s central main cannon has enough power to blast a hole into a mountain.

name: Caterpie
descriptionX: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
descriptionY: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: Metapod
descriptionX: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
descriptionY: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can’t withstand a harsh attack.

name: Butterfree
descriptionX: It loves the nectar of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.
descriptionY: It loves the nectar of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.

name: Gigantamax Butterfree
descriptionX: Crystallized Gigantamax energy makes up this Pokémon’s blindingly bright and highly toxic scales.
descriptionY: Once it has opponents trapped in a tornado that could blow away a 10-ton truck, it finishes them off with its poisonous scales.

name: Weedle
descriptionX: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.
descriptionY: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

name: Kakuna
descriptionX: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.
descriptionY: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

name: Beedrill
descriptionX: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
descriptionY: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

name: Mega Beedrill
descriptionX: Its legs have become poison stingers. It stabs its prey repeatedly with the stingers on its limbs, dealing the final blow with the stinger on its rear.
descriptionY: Its legs have become poison stingers. It stabs its prey repeatedly with the stingers on its limbs, dealing the final blow with the stinger on its rear.

name: Pidgey
descriptionX: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.
descriptionY: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

name: Pidgeotto
descriptionX: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.
descriptionY: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

name: Pidgeot
descriptionX: This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.
descriptionY: This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.

name: Mega Pidgeot
descriptionX: With its muscular strength now greatly increased, it can fly continuously for two weeks without resting.
descriptionY: With its muscular strength now greatly increased, it can fly continuously for two weeks without resting.

name: Rattata
descriptionX: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, you can be certain that 40 more live in the area.
descriptionY: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, you can be certain that 40 more live in the area.

name: Alolan Form
descriptionX: Its whiskers provide it with a keen sense of smell, enabling it to pick up the scent of hidden food and locate it instantly.
descriptionY: Its whiskers provide it with a keen sense of smell, enabling it to pick up the scent of hidden food and locate it instantly.

name: Raticate
descriptionX: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.
descriptionY: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

name: Alolan Form
descriptionX: It makes its Rattata underlings gather food for it, dining solely on the most nutritious and delicious fare.
descriptionY: It makes its Rattata underlings gather food for it, dining solely on the most nutritious and delicious fare.

name: Spearow
descriptionX: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.
descriptionY: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

name: Fearow
descriptionX: A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.
descriptionY: A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.

name: Ekans
descriptionX: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
descriptionY: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

name: Arbok
descriptionX: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.
descriptionY: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

name: Pikachu
descriptionX: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.
descriptionY: When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity can build and cause lightning storms.

name: Gigantamax Pikachu
descriptionX: Its Gigantamax power expanded, forming its supersized body and towering tail.
descriptionY: When it smashes its opponents with its bolt-shaped tail, it delivers a surge of electricity equivalent to a lightning strike.

name: Raichu
descriptionX: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.
descriptionY: If the electric pouches in its cheeks become fully charged, both ears will stand straight up.

name: Alolan Raichu
descriptionX: It’s believed that the weather, climate, and food of the Alola region all play a part in causing Pikachu to evolve into this form of Raichu.
descriptionY: This Pokémon rides on its tail while it uses its psychic powers to levitate. It attacks with star-shaped thunderbolts.

name: Sandshrew
descriptionX: It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas. By sand bathing, the Pokémon rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body.
descriptionY: It burrows into the ground to create its nest. If hard stones impede its tunneling, it uses its sharp claws to shatter them and then carries on digging.

name: Alolan Form
descriptionX: Life on mountains covered with deep snow has granted this Pokémon a body of ice that’s as hard as steel.
descriptionY: It lives in snowy mountains on southern islands. When a blizzard rolls in, this Pokémon hunkers down in the snow to avoid getting blown away.

name: Sandslash
descriptionX: The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother the Pokémon’s spikes will feel when touched.
descriptionY: It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws. Sandslash shares the berries it gathers, dropping them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.

name: Alolan Form
descriptionX: It uses large, hooked claws to cut a path through deep snow as it runs. On snowy mountains, this Sandslash is faster than any other Pokémon.
descriptionY: Many people climb snowy mountains, hoping to see the icy spikes of these Pokémon glistening in the light of dawn.

name: Nidoran♀
descriptionX: Females are more sensitive to smells than males. While foraging, they’ll use their whiskers to check wind direction and stay downwind of predators.
descriptionY: It uses its hard incisor teeth to crush and eat berries. The tip of a female Nidoran’s horn is a bit more rounded than the tip of a male’s horn.

name: Nidorina
descriptionX: The horn on its head has atrophied. It’s thought that this happens so Nidorina’s children won’t get poked while their mother is feeding them.
descriptionY: If the group is threatened, these Pokémon will band together to assault enemies with a chorus of ultrasonic waves.

name: Nidoqueen
descriptionX: Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield its children from any kind of attack.
descriptionY: It pacifies offspring by placing them in the gaps between the spines on its back. The spines will never secrete poison while young are present.

name: Nidoran♂
descriptionX: The horn on a male Nidoran’s forehead contains a powerful poison. This is a very cautious Pokémon, always straining its large ears.
descriptionY: Small but brave, this Pokémon will hold its ground and even risk its life in battle to protect the female it’s friendly with.

name: Nidorino
descriptionX: With a horn that’s harder than diamond, this Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it searches for a moon stone.
descriptionY: It’s nervous and quick to act aggressively. The potency of its poison increases along with the level of adrenaline present in its body.

name: Nidoking
descriptionX: When it goes on a rampage, it’s impossible to control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it’s lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.
descriptionY: Nidoking prides itself on its strength. It’s forceful and spirited in battle, making use of its thick tail and diamond-crushing horn.

name: Clefairy
descriptionX: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.
descriptionY: Its adorable behavior and cry make it highly popular. However, this cute Pokémon is rarely found.

name: Clefable
descriptionX: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.
descriptionY: Their ears are sensitive enough to hear a pin drop from over a mile away, so they’re usually found in quiet places.

name: Vulpix
descriptionX: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.
descriptionY: As each tail grows, its fur becomes more lustrous. When held, it feels slightly warm.

name: Alolan Form
descriptionX: After long years in the ever-snowcapped mountains of Alola, this Vulpix has gained power over ice.
descriptionY: If you observe its curly hairs through a microscope, you’ll see small ice particles springing up.

name: Ninetales
descriptionX: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.
descriptionY: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.

name: Alolan Form
descriptionX: A deity resides in the snowy mountains where this Pokémon lives. In ancient times, it was worshiped as that deity’s incarnation.
descriptionY: While it will guide travelers who get lost on a snowy mountain down to the mountain’s base, it won’t forgive anyone who harms nature.

name: Jigglypuff
descriptionX: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
descriptionY: If it inflates to sing a lullaby, it can perform longer and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.

name: Wigglytuff
descriptionX: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a body slam.
descriptionY: The rich, fluffy fur that covers its body feels so good that anyone who feels it can’t stop touching it.

name: Zubat
descriptionX: It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill.
descriptionY: Zubat live in caves, down where the sun’s light won’t reach. In the morning, they gather together to keep each other warm as they sleep.

name: Golbat
descriptionX: It loves to drink other creatures’ blood. It’s said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood it’s gathered.
descriptionY: Its feet are tiny, but this Pokémon walks skillfully. It sneaks up on sleeping prey before sinking in its fangs and slurping up blood.

name: Oddish
descriptionX: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.
descriptionY: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.

name: Gloom
descriptionX: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.
descriptionY: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.

name: Vileplume
descriptionX: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
descriptionY: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

name: Paras
descriptionX: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.
descriptionY: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.

name: Parasect
descriptionX: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushroom on its back. The mushroom appears to do all the thinking.
descriptionY: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushroom on its back. The mushroom appears to do all the thinking.

name: Venonat
descriptionX: Poison oozes from all over its body. It catches small bug Pokémon at night that are attracted by light.
descriptionY: Its eyes act as radar, enabling it to be active in darkness. The eyes can also shoot powerful beams.

name: Venomoth
descriptionX: The wings are covered with dustlike scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it looses highly toxic dust.
descriptionY: When it attacks, it flaps its large wings violently to scatter its poisonous powder all around.

name: Diglett
descriptionX: It lives about one yard underground, where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.
descriptionY: Its skin is very thin. If it is exposed to light, its blood heats up, causing it to grow weak.

name: Alolan Diglett
descriptionX: The metal-rich geology of this Pokémon’s habitat caused it to develop steel whiskers on its head.
descriptionY: Its three hairs change shape depending on Diglett’s mood. They’re a useful communication tool among these Pokémon.

name: Dugtrio
descriptionX: Its three heads bob separately up and down to loosen the soil nearby, making it easier for it to burrow.
descriptionY: In battle, it digs through the ground and strikes the unsuspecting foe from an unexpected direction.

name: Alolan Dugtrio
descriptionX: Their beautiful, metallic whiskers create a sort of protective helmet on their heads, and they also function as highly precise sensors.
descriptionY: The three of them get along very well. Through their formidable teamwork, they defeat powerful opponents.

name: Meowth
descriptionX: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.
descriptionY: It loves things that sparkle. When it sees a shiny object, the gold coin on its head shines, too.

name: Alolan Meowth
descriptionX: It’s accustomed to luxury because it used to live with Alolan royalty. As a result, it’s very picky about food.
descriptionY: Deeply proud and keenly smart, this Pokémon moves with cunning during battle and relentlessly attacks enemies’ weak points.

name: Galarian Meowth
descriptionX: Living with a savage, seafaring people has toughened this Pokémon’s body so much that parts of it have turned to iron.
descriptionY: These daring Pokémon have coins on their foreheads. Darker coins are harder, and harder coins garner more respect among Meowth.

name: Gigantamax Meowth
descriptionX: The pattern that has appeared on its giant coin is thought to be the key to unlocking the secrets of the Dynamax phenomenon.
descriptionY: Its body has grown incredibly long and the coin on its forehead has grown incredibly large—all thanks to Gigantamax power.

name: Persian
descriptionX: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
descriptionY: It has a vicious temperament. Beware if it raises its tail straight up. This is a signal that it is about to pounce and bite.

name: Alolan Persian
descriptionX: The round face of Alolan Persian is considered to be a symbol of prosperity in the Alola region, so these Pokémon are very well cared for.
descriptionY: This Pokémon is one tough opponent. Not only does it have formidable physical abilities, but it’s also not above fighting dirty.

name: Psyduck
descriptionX: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.
descriptionY: If its chronic headache peaks, it may exhibit odd powers. It seems unable to recall such an episode.

name: Golduck
descriptionX: When it swims at full speed using its long, webbed limbs, its forehead somehow begins to glow.
descriptionY: It swims gracefully along on the quiet, slow-moving rivers and lakes of which it is so fond.

name: Mankey
descriptionX: It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.
descriptionY: It is extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment, then thrashing away the next instant.

name: Primeape
descriptionX: It becomes wildly furious if it even senses someone looking at it. It chases anyone that meets its glare.
descriptionY: Some researchers theorize that Primeape remains angry even when inside a Poké Ball.

name: Growlithe
descriptionX: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.
descriptionY: It’s very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting.

name: Hisuian Growlithe
descriptionX: They patrol their territory in pairs. I believe the igneous rock components in the fur of this species are the result of volcanic activity in its habitat.
descriptionY: They patrol their territory in pairs. I believe the igneous rock components in the fur of this species are the result of volcanic activity in its habitat.

name: Arcanine
descriptionX: An ancient picture scroll shows that people were captivated by its movement as it ran through prairies.
descriptionY: Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of majesty. Anyone hearing it can’t help but grovel before it.

name: Hisuian Arcanine
descriptionX: Snaps at its foes with fangs cloaked in blazing flame. Despite its bulk, it deftly feints every which way, leading opponents on a deceptively merry chase as it all but dances around them.
descriptionY: Snaps at its foes with fangs cloaked in blazing flame. Despite its bulk, it deftly feints every which way, leading opponents on a deceptively merry chase as it all but dances around them.

name: Poliwag
descriptionX: For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking. The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of the Pokémon’s innards showing through the skin.
descriptionY: In rivers with fast-flowing water, this Pokémon will cling to a rock by using its thick lips, which act like a suction cup.

name: Poliwhirl
descriptionX: Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness. This trait of Poliwhirl’s has been used in place of lullabies to get children to go to sleep.
descriptionY: This Pokémon’s sweat is a slimy mucus. When captured, Poliwhirl can slither from its enemies’ grasp and escape.

name: Poliwrath
descriptionX: Its body is solid muscle. When swimming through cold seas, Poliwrath uses its impressive arms to smash through drift ice and plow forward.
descriptionY: Poliwrath is skilled at both swimming and martial arts. It uses its well-trained arms to dish out powerful punches.

name: Abra
descriptionX: This Pokémon uses its psychic powers while it sleeps. The contents of Abra’s dreams affect the powers that the Pokémon wields.
descriptionY: Abra can teleport in its sleep. Apparently the more deeply Abra sleeps, the farther its teleportations go.

name: Kadabra
descriptionX: Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.
descriptionY: This Pokémon’s telekinesis is immensely powerful. To prepare for evolution, Kadabra stores up psychic energy in the star on its forehead.

name: Alakazam
descriptionX: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.
descriptionY: Alakazam wields potent psychic powers. It’s said that this Pokémon used these powers to create the spoons it holds.

name: Mega Alakazam
descriptionX: It’s adept at precognition. When attacks completely miss Alakazam, that’s because it’s seeing the future.
descriptionY: It’s adept at precognition. When attacks completely miss Alakazam, that’s because it’s seeing the future.

name: Machop
descriptionX: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.
descriptionY: Always brimming with power, it passes time by lifting boulders. Doing so makes it even stronger.

name: Machoke
descriptionX: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
descriptionY: Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.

name: Machamp
descriptionX: It punches with its four arms at blinding speed. It can launch 1,000 punches in two seconds.
descriptionY: It can knock a train flying with a punch. However, it is terrible at delicate work using its fingers.

name: Gigantamax Machamp
descriptionX: The Gigantamax energy coursing through its arms makes its punches hit as hard as bomb blasts.
descriptionY: One of these Pokémon once used its immeasurable strength to lift a large ship that was in trouble. It then carried the ship to port.

name: Bellsprout
descriptionX: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.
descriptionY: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.

name: Weepinbell
descriptionX: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.
descriptionY: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.

name: Victreebel
descriptionX: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all.
descriptionY: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all.

name: Tentacool
descriptionX: Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer. It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it searches for prey.
descriptionY: This Pokémon is mostly made of water. A Tentacool out in the ocean is very hard to spot, because its body blends in with the sea.

name: Tentacruel
descriptionX: When the red orbs on Tentacruel’s head glow brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.
descriptionY: Its 80 tentacles can stretch and shrink freely. Tentacruel ensnares prey in a net of spread-out tentacles, delivering venomous stings to its catch.

name: Geodude
descriptionX: Commonly found near mountain trails and the like. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.
descriptionY: Commonly found near mountain trails and the like. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.

name: Alolan Form
descriptionX: Its stone head is imbued with electricity and magnetism. If you carelessly step on one, you’ll be in for a painful shock.
descriptionY: Its stone head is imbued with electricity and magnetism. If you carelessly step on one, you’ll be in for a painful shock.

name: Graveler
descriptionX: Often seen rolling down mountain trails. Obstacles are just things to roll straight over, not avoid.
descriptionY: Often seen rolling down mountain trails. Obstacles are just things to roll straight over, not avoid.

name: Alolan Form
descriptionX: When it comes rolling down a mountain path, anything in its way gets zapped by electricity and sent flying.
descriptionY: When it comes rolling down a mountain path, anything in its way gets zapped by electricity and sent flying.

name: Golem
descriptionX: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it’s exposed to air.
descriptionY: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it’s exposed to air.

name: Alolan Form
descriptionX: It uses magnetism to accelerate and fire off rocks tinged with electricity. Even if it doesn’t score a direct hit, the jolt of electricity will do the job.
descriptionY: It uses magnetism to accelerate and fire off rocks tinged with electricity. Even if it doesn’t score a direct hit, the jolt of electricity will do the job.

name: Ponyta
descriptionX: About an hour after birth, Ponyta’s fiery mane and tail grow out, giving the Pokémon an impressive appearance.
descriptionY: Its legs grow strong while it chases after its parents. It runs all day in fields and on mountains.

name: Galarian Ponyta
descriptionX: Its small horn hides a healing power. With a few rubs from this Pokémon’s horn, any slight wound you have will be healed.
descriptionY: This Pokémon will look into your eyes and read the contents of your heart. If it finds evil there, it promptly hides away.

name: Rapidash
descriptionX: It gallops at nearly 150 mph. With its mane blazing ferociously, it races as if it were an arrow.
descriptionY: It has astounding acceleration. From a standstill, it can reach top speed within 10 steps.

name: Galarian Rapidash
descriptionX: Little can stand up to its psycho cut. Unleashed from this Pokémon’s horn, the move will punch a hole right through a thick metal sheet.
descriptionY: Brave and prideful, this Pokémon dashes airily through the forest, its steps aided by the psychic power stored in the fur on its fetlocks.

name: Slowpoke
descriptionX: It is incredibly slow and dopey. It takes five seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.
descriptionY: It is always vacantly lost in thought, but no one knows what it is thinking about. It is good at fishing with its tail.

name: Galarian Slowpoke
descriptionX: Although this Pokémon is normally zoned out, its expression abruptly sharpens on occasion. The cause for this seems to lie in Slowpoke’s diet.
descriptionY: Because Galarian Slowpoke eat the seeds of a plant that grows only in Galar, their tails have developed a spicy flavor.

name: Slowbro
descriptionX: When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a Shellder. That made it evolve into Slowbro.
descriptionY: If the tail-biting Shellder is thrown off in a harsh battle, this Pokémon reverts to being an ordinary Slowpoke.

name: Mega Slowbro
descriptionX: Under the influence of Shellder’s digestive fluids, Slowpoke has awakened, gaining a great deal of power—and a little motivation to boot.
descriptionY: Under the influence of Shellder’s digestive fluids, Slowpoke has awakened, gaining a great deal of power—and a little motivation to boot.

name: Galarian Slowbro
descriptionX: A Shellder bite set off a chemical reaction with the spices inside Slowbro’s body, causing Slowbro to become a Poison-type Pokémon.
descriptionY: If this Pokémon squeezes the tongue of the Shellder biting it, the Shellder will launch a toxic liquid from the tip of its shell.

name: Magnemite
descriptionX: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.
descriptionY: It moves while constantly hovering. It discharges electromagnetic waves and so on from the units at its sides.

name: Magneton
descriptionX: Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.
descriptionY: They’re formed by several Magnemite linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

name: Farfetch’d
descriptionX: It can’t live without the stalk it holds. That’s why it defends the stalk from attackers with its life.
descriptionY: It can’t live without the stalk it holds. That’s why it defends the stalk from attackers with its life.

name: Galarian Farfetch’d
descriptionX: The Farfetch’d of the Galar region are brave warriors, and they wield thick, tough leeks in battle.
descriptionY: The stalks of leeks are thicker and longer in the Galar region. Farfetch’d that adapted to these stalks took on a unique form.

name: Doduo
descriptionX: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.
descriptionY: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.

name: Dodrio
descriptionX: One of Doduo’s two heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph in prairies.
descriptionY: One of Doduo’s two heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph in prairies.

name: Seel
descriptionX: Loves freezing-cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit.
descriptionY: Loves freezing-cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Dewgong
descriptionX: Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.
descriptionY: Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.

name: Grimer
descriptionX: Born from sludge, these Pokémon now gather in polluted places and increase the bacteria in their bodies.
descriptionY: When two of these Pokémon’s bodies are combined together, new poisons are created.

name: Alolan Grimer
descriptionX: It has a passion for trash above all else, speedily digesting it and creating brilliant crystals of sparkling poison.
descriptionY: It has a passion for trash above all else, speedily digesting it and creating brilliant crystals of sparkling poison.

name: Muk
descriptionX: It’s thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.
descriptionY: It’s so stinky! Muk’s body contains toxic elements, and any plant will wilt when it passes by.

name: Alolan Muk
descriptionX: Muk’s coloration becomes increasingly vivid the more it feasts on its favorite dish—trash.
descriptionY: Muk’s coloration becomes increasingly vivid the more it feasts on its favorite dish—trash.

name: Shellder
descriptionX: It is encased in a shell that is harder than diamond. Inside, however, it is surprisingly tender.
descriptionY: Clamping on to an opponent reveals its vulnerable parts, so it uses this move only as a last resort.

name: Cloyster
descriptionX: Cloyster that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.
descriptionY: When attacked, it launches its spikes in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

name: Gastly
descriptionX: It wraps its opponent in its gas-like body, slowly weakening its prey by poisoning it through the skin.
descriptionY: Its body is made of gas. Despite lacking substance, it can envelop an opponent of any size and cause suffocation.

name: Haunter
descriptionX: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.
descriptionY: In total darkness, where nothing is visible, Haunter lurks, silently stalking its next victim.

name: Gengar
descriptionX: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey’s shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.
descriptionY: Hiding in people’s shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.

name: Mega Gengar
descriptionX: It can pass through other dimensions and appear anywhere. It caused a stir one time when it stuck just one leg out of a wall.
descriptionY: It can pass through other dimensions and appear anywhere. It caused a stir one time when it stuck just one leg out of a wall.

name: Gigantamax Gengar
descriptionX: Rumor has it that its gigantic mouth leads not into its body, filled with cursed energy, but instead directly to the afterlife.
descriptionY: It lays traps, hoping to steal the lives of those it catches. If you stand in front of its mouth, you’ll hear your loved ones’ voices calling out to you.

name: Onix
descriptionX: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.
descriptionY: It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.

name: Drowzee
descriptionX: It remembers every dream it eats. It rarely eats the dreams of adults because children’s are much tastier.
descriptionY: When it twitches its nose, it can tell where someone is sleeping and what that person is dreaming about.

name: Hypno
descriptionX: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of psi moves, such as Hypnosis and Confusion.
descriptionY: Always holding a pendulum that it swings at a steady rhythm, it causes drowsiness in anyone nearby.

name: Krabby
descriptionX: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.
descriptionY: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.

name: Kingler
descriptionX: The larger pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.
descriptionY: The larger pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.

name: Gigantamax Kingler
descriptionX: The flow of Gigantamax energy has spurred this Pokémon’s left pincer to grow to an enormous size. That claw can pulverize anything.
descriptionY: The bubbles it spews out are strongly alkaline. Any opponents hit by them will have their bodies quickly melted away.

name: Voltorb
descriptionX: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.
descriptionY: It’s usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Poké Ball, it has zapped many people.

name: Hisuian Voltorb
descriptionX: An enigmatic Pokémon that happens to bear a resemblance to a Poké Ball. When excited, it discharges the electric current it has stored in its belly, then lets out a great, uproarious laugh.
descriptionY: An enigmatic Pokémon that happens to bear a resemblance to a Poké Ball. When excited, it discharges the electric current it has stored in its belly, then lets out a great, uproarious laugh.

name: Electrode
descriptionX: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.
descriptionY: It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname of the Bomb Ball.

name: Hisuian Electrode
descriptionX: The tissue on the surface of its body is curiously similar in composition to an Apricorn. When irritated, this Pokémon lets loose an electric current equal to 20 lightning bolts.
descriptionY: The tissue on the surface of its body is curiously similar in composition to an Apricorn. When irritated, this Pokémon lets loose an electric current equal to 20 lightning bolts.

name: Exeggcute
descriptionX: Though it may look like it’s just a bunch of eggs, it’s a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.
descriptionY: These Pokémon get nervous when they’re not in a group of six. The minute even one member of the group goes missing, Exeggcute become cowardly.

name: Exeggutor
descriptionX: Each of Exeggutor’s three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don’t seem to be very interested in one another.
descriptionY: When they work together, Exeggutor’s three heads can put out powerful psychic energy. Cloudy days make this Pokémon sluggish.

name: Alolan Form
descriptionX: Blazing sunlight has brought out the true form and powers of this Pokémon.
descriptionY: This Pokémon’s psychic powers aren’t as strong as they once were. The head on this Exeggutor’s tail scans surrounding areas with weak telepathy.

name: Cubone
descriptionX: When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head.
descriptionY: This Pokémon wears the skull of its deceased mother. Sometimes Cubone’s dreams make it cry, but each tear Cubone sheds makes it stronger.

name: Marowak
descriptionX: This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.
descriptionY: When this Pokémon evolved, the skull of its mother fused to it. Marowak’s temperament also turned vicious at the same time.

name: Alolan Form
descriptionX: This Pokémon sets the bone it holds on fire and dances through the night as a way to mourn its fallen allies.
descriptionY: The cursed flames that light up the bone carried by this Pokémon are said to cause both mental and physical pain that will never fade.

name: Hitmonlee
descriptionX: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.
descriptionY: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.

name: Hitmonchan
descriptionX: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.
descriptionY: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.

name: Lickitung
descriptionX: If this Pokémon’s sticky saliva gets on you and you don’t clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch won’t go away, either.
descriptionY: Bug Pokémon are Lickitung’s main food source. This Pokémon paralyzes its prey with a lick from its long tongue, then swallows the prey whole.

name: Koffing
descriptionX: Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw, rotting trash.
descriptionY: It adores polluted air. Some claim that Koffing used to be more plentiful in the Galar region than they are now.

name: Weezing
descriptionX: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.
descriptionY: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.

name: Galarian Weezing
descriptionX: This Pokémon consumes particles that contaminate the air. Instead of leaving droppings, it expels clean air.
descriptionY: Long ago, during a time when droves of factories fouled the air with pollution, Weezing changed into this form for some reason.

name: Rhyhorn
descriptionX: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.
descriptionY: It can remember only one thing at a time. Once it starts rushing, it forgets why it started.

name: Rhydon
descriptionX: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.
descriptionY: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Chansey
descriptionX: This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritious eggs and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.
descriptionY: It walks carefully to prevent its egg from breaking. However, it is extremely fast at running away.

name: Tangela
descriptionX: Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this Pokémon’s true appearance remains a mystery.
descriptionY: The vines of a Tangela have a distinct scent. In some parts of Galar, Tangela vines are used as herbs.

name: Kangaskhan
descriptionX: Although it’s carrying its baby in a pouch on its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.
descriptionY: There are records of a lost human child being raised by a childless Kangaskhan.

name: Mega Kangaskhan
descriptionX: Its child has grown rapidly, thanks to the energy of Mega Evolution. Mother and child show off their harmonious teamwork in battle.
descriptionY: Its child has grown rapidly, thanks to the energy of Mega Evolution. Mother and child show off their harmonious teamwork in battle.

name: Horsea
descriptionX: Horsea makes its home in oceans with gentle currents. If this Pokémon is under attack, it spits out pitch-black ink and escapes.
descriptionY: They swim with dance-like motions and cause whirlpools to form. Horsea compete to see which of them can generate the biggest whirlpool.

name: Seadra
descriptionX: It’s the males that raise the offspring. While Seadra are raising young, the spines on their backs secrete thicker and stronger poison.
descriptionY: Seadra’s mouth is slender, but its suction power is strong. In an instant, Seadra can suck in food that’s larger than the opening of its mouth.

name: Goldeen
descriptionX: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the Water Dancer.
descriptionY: Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.

name: Seaking
descriptionX: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.
descriptionY: Using its horn, it bores holes in riverbed boulders, making nests to prevent its eggs from washing away.

name: Staryu
descriptionX: If you visit a beach at the end of summer, you’ll be able to see groups of Staryu lighting up in a steady rhythm.
descriptionY: Fish Pokémon nibble at it, but Staryu isn’t bothered. Its body regenerates quickly, even if part of it is completely torn off.

name: Starmie
descriptionX: This Pokémon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers.
descriptionY: Starmie swims by spinning its body at high speed. As this Pokémon cruises through the ocean, it absorbs tiny plankton.

name: Mr. Mime
descriptionX: It is a pantomime expert that can create invisible but solid walls using miming gestures.
descriptionY: Emanations from its fingertips solidify the air into invisible walls that repel even harsh attacks.

name: Galarian Mr. Mime
descriptionX: Its talent is tap-dancing. It can also manipulate temperatures to create a floor of ice, which this Pokémon can kick up to use as a barrier.
descriptionY: It can radiate chilliness from the bottoms of its feet. It’ll spend the whole day tap-dancing on a frozen floor.

name: Scyther
descriptionX: It slashes through grass with its sharp scythes, moving too fast for the human eye to track.
descriptionY: The sharp scythes on its forearms become increasingly sharp by cutting through hard objects.

name: Jynx
descriptionX: In certain parts of Galar, Jynx was once feared and worshiped as the Queen of Ice.
descriptionY: The Jynx of Galar often have beautiful and delicate voices. Some of these Pokémon have even gathered a fan base.

name: Electabuzz
descriptionX: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.
descriptionY: With the coming of a storm, many of these Pokémon will gather under tall trees and sit there waiting for lightning to strike.

name: Magmar
descriptionX: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.
descriptionY: These Pokémon’s bodies are constantly burning. Magmar are feared as one of the causes behind fires.

name: Pinsir
descriptionX: These Pokémon judge one another based on pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make for more popularity with the opposite gender.
descriptionY: This Pokémon clamps its pincers down on its prey and then either splits the prey in half or flings it away.

name: Mega Pinsir
descriptionX: With its vaunted horns, it can lift an opponent 10 times heavier than itself and fly about with ease.
descriptionY: With its vaunted horns, it can lift an opponent 10 times heavier than itself and fly about with ease.

name: Tauros
descriptionX: Once it takes aim at its prey, it makes a headlong charge. It is famous for its violent nature.
descriptionY: Once it takes aim at its prey, it makes a headlong charge. It is famous for its violent nature.

name: Paldean Tauros (Combat Breed)
descriptionX: This Pokémon has a muscular body and excels at close-quarters combat. It uses its short horns to strike the opponent’s weak spots.
descriptionY: This kind of Tauros, known as the Combat Breed, is distinguished by its thick, powerful muscles and its fierce disposition.

name: Paldean Tauros (Blaze Breed)
descriptionX: When heated by fire energy, its horns can get hotter than 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit. Those gored by them will suffer both wounds and burns.
descriptionY: People call this kind of Tauros the Blaze Breed due to the hot air it snorts from its nostrils. Its three tails are intertwined.

name: Paldean Tauros (Aqua Breed)
descriptionX: This Pokémon blasts water from holes on the tips of its horns—the high-pressure jets pierce right through Tauros’s enemies.
descriptionY: It swims by jetting water from its horns. The most notable characteristic of the Aqua Breed is its high body fat, which allows it to float easily.

name: Magikarp
descriptionX: An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may jump high on rare occasions but never more than seven feet.
descriptionY: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

name: Gyarados
descriptionX: Once it appears, it goes on a rampage. It remains enraged until it demolishes everything around it.
descriptionY: It appears whenever there is world conflict, burning down any place it travels through.

name: Mega Gyarados
descriptionX: Although it obeys its instinctive drive to destroy everything within its reach, it will respond to orders from a Trainer it truly trusts.
descriptionY: Although it obeys its instinctive drive to destroy everything within its reach, it will respond to orders from a Trainer it truly trusts.

name: Lapras
descriptionX: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokémon on its back. It understands human speech.
descriptionY: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokémon on its back. It understands human speech.

name: Gigantamax Lapras
descriptionX: Over 5,000 people can ride on its shell at once. And it’s a very comfortable ride, without the slightest shaking or swaying.
descriptionY: It surrounds itself with a huge ring of gathered ice particles. It uses the ring to smash any icebergs that might impede its graceful swimming.

name: Ditto
descriptionX: Its transformation ability is perfect. However, if made to laugh, it can’t maintain its disguise.
descriptionY: It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to transform into other life-forms.

name: Eevee
descriptionX: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.
descriptionY: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element stones.

name: Gigantamax Eevee
descriptionX: Gigantamax energy upped the fluffiness of the fur around Eevee’s neck. The fur will envelop a foe, capturing its body and captivating its mind.
descriptionY: Having gotten even friendlier and more innocent, Eevee tries to play with anyone around, only to end up crushing them with its immense body.

name: Vaporeon
descriptionX: It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid’s.
descriptionY: Its cell composition is similar to water molecules. As a result, it can’t be seen when it melts away into water.

name: Jolteon
descriptionX: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.
descriptionY: If agitated, it uses electricity to straighten out its fur and launch it in small bunches.

name: Flareon
descriptionX: Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated, and exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
descriptionY: It fluffs out its fur collar to cool down its body temperature, which can reach 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Porygon
descriptionX: State-of-the-art technology was used to create Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be created via computer programming.
descriptionY: In recent years, this species has been very helpful in cyberspace. These Pokémon will go around checking to make sure no suspicious data exists.

name: Omanyte
descriptionX: Because some Omanyte manage to escape after being restored or are released into the wild by people, this species is becoming a problem.
descriptionY: This Pokémon is a member of an ancient, extinct species. Omanyte paddles through water with its 10 tentacles, looking like it’s just drifting along.

name: Omastar
descriptionX: Weighed down by a large and heavy shell, Omastar couldn’t move very fast. Some say it went extinct because it was unable to catch food.
descriptionY: Omastar’s sharp fangs could crush rock, but the Pokémon can attack only the prey that come within reach of its tentacles.

name: Kabuto
descriptionX: This species is almost entirely extinct. Kabuto molt every three days, making their shells harder and harder.
descriptionY: While some say this species has gone extinct, Kabuto sightings are apparently fairly common in some places.

name: Kabutops
descriptionX: Kabutops slices its prey apart and sucks out the fluids. The discarded body parts become food for other Pokémon.
descriptionY: The cause behind the extinction of this species is unknown. Kabutops were aggressive Pokémon that inhabited warm seas.

name: Aerodactyl
descriptionX: This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient times. Apparently even modern technology is incapable of producing a perfectly restored specimen.
descriptionY: Aerodactyl’s sawlike fangs can shred skin to tatters—even the skin of Steel-type Pokémon.

name: Mega Aerodactyl
descriptionX: The power of Mega Evolution has completely restored its genes. The rocks on its body are harder than diamond.
descriptionY: The power of Mega Evolution has completely restored its genes. The rocks on its body are harder than diamond.

name: Snorlax
descriptionX: Its stomach can digest any kind of food, even if it happens to be moldy or rotten.
descriptionY: It stops eating only to sleep. It doesn’t feel full unless it eats nearly 900 pounds a day.

name: Gigantamax Snorlax
descriptionX: Gigantamax energy has affected stray seeds and even pebbles that got stuck to Snorlax, making them grow to a huge size.
descriptionY: Terrifyingly strong, this Pokémon is the size of a mountain—and moves about as much as one as well.

name: Articuno
descriptionX: This legendary bird Pokémon can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.
descriptionY: This legendary bird Pokémon can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.

name: Galarian Articuno
descriptionX: Its feather-like blades are composed of psychic energy and can shear through thick iron sheets as if they were paper.
descriptionY: Known as Articuno, this Pokémon fires beams that can immobilize opponents as if they had been frozen solid.

name: Zapdos
descriptionX: This legendary Pokémon is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.
descriptionY: This legendary Pokémon is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.

name: Galarian Zapdos
descriptionX: When its feathers rub together, they produce a crackling sound like the zapping of electricity. That’s why this Pokémon is called Zapdos.
descriptionY: One kick from its powerful legs will pulverize a dump truck. Supposedly, this Pokémon runs through the mountains at over 180 mph.

name: Moltres
descriptionX: It is one of the legendary bird Pokémon. Its appearance is said to indicate the coming of spring.
descriptionY: It is one of the legendary bird Pokémon. Its appearance is said to indicate the coming of spring.

name: Galarian Moltres
descriptionX: This Pokémon’s sinister, flame-like aura will consume the spirit of any creature it hits. Victims become burned-out shadows of themselves.
descriptionY: The sinister aura that blazes like molten fire around this Pokémon is what inspired the name Moltres.

name: Dratini
descriptionX: It sheds many layers of skin as it grows larger. During this process, it is protected by a rapid waterfall.
descriptionY: It is born large to start with. It repeatedly sheds its skin as it steadily grows longer.

name: Dragonair
descriptionX: They say that if it emits an aura from its whole body, the weather will begin to change instantly.
descriptionY: It is called the divine Pokémon. When its entire body brightens slightly, the weather changes.

name: Dragonite
descriptionX: It is said that somewhere in the ocean lies an island where these gather. Only they live there.
descriptionY: It can fly in spite of its big and bulky physique. It circles the globe in just 16 hours.

name: Mewtwo
descriptionX: Its DNA is almost the same as Mew’s. However, its size and disposition are vastly different.
descriptionY: Its DNA is almost the same as Mew’s. However, its size and disposition are vastly different.

name: Mega Mewtwo X
descriptionX: Psychic power has augmented its muscles. It has a grip strength of one ton and can sprint a hundred meters in two seconds flat!
descriptionY: Psychic power has augmented its muscles. It has a grip strength of one ton and can sprint a hundred meters in two seconds flat!

name: Mega Mewtwo Y
descriptionX: Despite its diminished size, its mental power has grown phenomenally. With a mere thought, it can smash a skyscraper to smithereens.
descriptionY: Despite its diminished size, its mental power has grown phenomenally. With a mere thought, it can smash a skyscraper to smithereens.

name: Mew
descriptionX: When viewed through a microscope, this Pokémon’s short, fine, delicate hair can be seen.
descriptionY: When viewed through a microscope, this Pokémon’s short, fine, delicate hair can be seen.

name: Chikorita
descriptionX: In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, becalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy, friendly atmosphere all around.
descriptionY: In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, becalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy, friendly atmosphere all around.

name: Bayleef
descriptionX: Bayleef’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.
descriptionY: Bayleef’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.

name: Meganium
descriptionX: The fragrance of Meganium’s flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, this Pokémon gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe’s fighting spirit.
descriptionY: The fragrance of Meganium’s flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, this Pokémon gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe’s fighting spirit.

name: Cyndaquil
descriptionX: Cyndaquil protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back. The flames are vigorous if the Pokémon is angry. However, if it is tired, the flames splutter fitfully with incomplete combustion.
descriptionY: Cyndaquil protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back. The flames are vigorous if the Pokémon is angry. However, if it is tired, the flames splutter fitfully with incomplete combustion.

name: Quilava
descriptionX: Quilava keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames and gusts of superheated air. This Pokémon applies its outstanding nimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching the foe with flames.
descriptionY: Quilava keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames and gusts of superheated air. This Pokémon applies its outstanding nimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching the foe with flames.

name: Typhlosion
descriptionX: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.
descriptionY: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.

name: Hisuian Typhlosion
descriptionX: Said to purify lost, forsaken souls with its flames and guide them to the afterlife. I believe its form has been influenced by the energy of the sacred mountain towering at Hisui’s center.
descriptionY: Said to purify lost, forsaken souls with its flames and guide them to the afterlife. I believe its form has been influenced by the energy of the sacred mountain towering at Hisui’s center.

name: Totodile
descriptionX: Despite the smallness of its body, Totodile’s jaws are very powerful. While the Pokémon may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.
descriptionY: Despite the smallness of its body, Totodile’s jaws are very powerful. While the Pokémon may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.

name: Croconaw
descriptionX: Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to remove when they have sunk in.
descriptionY: Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to remove when they have sunk in.

name: Feraligatr
descriptionX: Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.
descriptionY: Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.

name: Sentret
descriptionX: When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard. The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When this Pokémon becomes separated from its pack, it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.
descriptionY: When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard. The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When this Pokémon becomes separated from its pack, it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.

name: Furret
descriptionX: Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, this Pokémon is very nimble and fleet.
descriptionY: Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, this Pokémon is very nimble and fleet.

name: Hoothoot
descriptionX: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.
descriptionY: It begins to hoot at the same time every day. Some Trainers use them in place of clocks.

name: Noctowl
descriptionX: Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.
descriptionY: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.

name: Ledyba
descriptionX: This Pokémon is very sensitive to cold. In the warmth of Alola, it appears quite lively.
descriptionY: These very cowardly Pokémon join together and use Reflect to protect their nest.

name: Ledian
descriptionX: It’s said that the patterns on its back are related to the stars in the night sky, but the details of that relationship remain unclear.
descriptionY: It flies through the night sky, sprinkling sparkly dust. According to some, if that dust sticks to you, good things will happen to you.

name: Spinarak
descriptionX: With threads from its mouth, it fashions sturdy webs that won’t break even if you set a rock on them.
descriptionY: Although the poison from its fangs isn’t that strong, it’s potent enough to weaken prey that gets caught in its web.

name: Ariados
descriptionX: Every night, it wanders around in search of prey, whose movements it restrains by spewing threads before it bites into them with its fangs.
descriptionY: It spews threads from its mouth to catch its prey. When night falls, it leaves its web to go hunt aggressively.

name: Crobat
descriptionX: Both of its legs have turned into wings. Without a sound, Crobat flies swiftly toward its prey and sinks its fangs into the nape of its target’s neck.
descriptionY: This Pokémon flaps its four wings skillfully. Crobat can fly through cramped caves without needing to slow down.

name: Chinchou
descriptionX: Its antennae, which evolved from a fin, have both positive and negative charges flowing through them.
descriptionY: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights.

name: Lanturn
descriptionX: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea’s surface from a depth of over three miles.
descriptionY: This Pokémon flashes a bright light that blinds its prey. This creates an opening for it to deliver an electrical attack.

name: Pichu
descriptionX: It is unskilled at storing electric power. Any kind of shock causes it to discharge energy spontaneously.
descriptionY: Despite this Pokémon’s cute appearance, those who want to live with one should prepare to be on the receiving end of its electric jolts.

name: Cleffa
descriptionX: According to local rumors, Cleffa are often seen in places where shooting stars have fallen.
descriptionY: Because of its unusual, starlike silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.

name: Igglybuff
descriptionX: Its body has a faintly sweet scent and is bouncy and soft. If it bounces even once, it cannot stop.
descriptionY: It likes to sing but is not yet good at it. With praise and encouragement, it will get better little by little.

name: Togepi
descriptionX: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.
descriptionY: It is considered to be a symbol of good luck. Its shell is said to be filled with happiness.

name: Togetic
descriptionX: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.
descriptionY: It grows dispirited if it is not with kind people. It can float in midair without moving its wings.

name: Natu
descriptionX: It is extremely good at climbing tree trunks and likes to eat the new sprouts on the trees.
descriptionY: Because its wings aren’t yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.

name: Xatu
descriptionX: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.
descriptionY: This odd Pokémon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun’s movement all day.

name: Mareep
descriptionX: If static electricity builds in its body, its fleece doubles in volume. Touching it will shock you.
descriptionY: Its fleece grows continually. In the summer, the fleece is fully shed, but it grows back in a week.

name: Flaaffy
descriptionX: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won’t grow.
descriptionY: Because of its rubbery, electricity-resistant skin, it can store lots of electricity in its fur.

name: Ampharos
descriptionX: The bright light on its tail can be seen far away. It has been treasured since ancient times as a beacon.
descriptionY: When it gets dark, the light from its bright, shiny tail can be seen from far away on the ocean’s surface.

name: Mega Ampharos
descriptionX: Excess energy from Mega Evolution stimulates its genes, and the wool it had lost grows in again.
descriptionY: Massive amounts of energy intensely stimulated Ampharos’s cells, apparently awakening its long-sleeping dragon’s blood.

name: Bellossom
descriptionX: Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.
descriptionY: Bellossom gather at times and appear to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.

name: Marill
descriptionX: The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can stay dry even when it plays in the water.
descriptionY: The oil-filled tail functions as a buoy, so it’s fine even in rivers with strong currents.

name: Azumarill
descriptionX: Its long ears are superb sensors. It can distinguish the movements of things in water and tell what they are.
descriptionY: By keeping still and listening intently, it can tell what is in even wild, fast-moving rivers.

name: Sudowoodo
descriptionX: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears more similar to rock than to vegetation.
descriptionY: To avoid being attacked, it does nothing but mimic a tree. It hates water and flees from rain.

name: Politoed
descriptionX: At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on the shores of lakes. They announce their territorial claims by letting out cries that sound like shouting.
descriptionY: The cry of a male is louder than that of a female. Male Politoed with deep, menacing voices find more popularity with the opposite gender.

name: Hoppip
descriptionX: This Pokémon is blown across vast distances by the wind. It is unclear where the Hoppip of Paldea originally came from.
descriptionY: Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be found practically everywhere. This is because the wind carries this species all over the world.

name: Skiploom
descriptionX: Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell where a Skiploom was born by the scent drifting from the flower on the Pokémon’s head.
descriptionY: When the weather grows cold, Skiploom’s flower closes and the Pokémon cannot photosynthesize, so it flies away to warmer regions.

name: Jumpluff
descriptionX: Jumpluff travels on seasonal winds. Once its cotton spores run out, its journey ends, as does its life.
descriptionY: Beware its cotton spores. If you accidentally breathe them in, you’ll be racked with coughs and itchiness.

name: Aipom
descriptionX: As it did more and more with its tail, its hands became clumsy. It makes its nest high in the treetops.
descriptionY: It searches for prey from the tops of trees. When it spots its favorite food, Bounsweet, Aipom gets excited and pounces.

name: Sunkern
descriptionX: It suddenly falls out of the sky in the morning. Knowing it’s weak, it simply feeds until it evolves.
descriptionY: It is very weak. Its only means of defense is to shake its leaves desperately at its attacker.

name: Sunflora
descriptionX: In the daytime, it rushes about in a hectic manner, but it comes to a complete stop when the sun sets.
descriptionY: Since it converts sunlight into energy, it is always looking in the direction of the sun.

name: Yanma
descriptionX: Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair. This Pokémon uses its flying ability to quickly chase down targeted prey.
descriptionY: Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair. This Pokémon uses its flying ability to quickly chase down targeted prey.

name: Wooper
descriptionX: This Pokémon lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.
descriptionY: When the temperature cools in the evening, they emerge from water to seek food along the shore.

name: Paldean Wooper
descriptionX: After losing a territorial struggle, Wooper began living on land. The Pokémon changed over time, developing a poisonous film to protect its body.
descriptionY: It’s dangerous for Wooper to travel alone. They line up in groups of three or four and help each other as they walk around the wetlands.

name: Quagsire
descriptionX: It has an easygoing nature. It doesn’t care if it bumps its head on boats and boulders while swimming.
descriptionY: A dim-witted Pokémon. It doesn’t care if it bumps its head into boats or rocks while swimming.

name: Espeon
descriptionX: The tip of its forked tail quivers when it is predicting its opponent’s next move.
descriptionY: It uses the fine hair that covers its body to sense air currents and predict its enemy’s actions.

name: Umbreon
descriptionX: When exposed to the moon’s aura, the rings on its body glow faintly and it gains a mysterious power.
descriptionY: When darkness falls, the rings on the body begin to glow, striking fear in the hearts of anyone nearby.

name: Murkrow
descriptionX: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.
descriptionY: If spotted, it will lure an unwary person into chasing it, then lose the pursuer on mountain trails.

name: Slowking
descriptionX: When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke’s head and unlocked an extraordinary power.
descriptionY: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.

name: Galarian Slowking
descriptionX: A combination of toxins and the shock of evolving has increased Shellder’s intelligence to the point that Shellder now controls Slowking.
descriptionY: While chanting strange spells, this Pokémon combines its internal toxins with what it’s eaten, creating strange potions.

name: Misdreavus
descriptionX: This Pokémon startles people in the middle of the night. It gathers fear as its energy.
descriptionY: It loves to bite and yank people’s hair from behind without warning, just to see their shocked reactions.

name: Unown
descriptionX: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.
descriptionY: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.

name: Wobbuffet
descriptionX: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.
descriptionY: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.

name: Girafarig
descriptionX: Though very small, the brain in its tail is still considered an important organ because it emits powerful psychic energy.
descriptionY: Girafarig’s tail has a small head. It instinctively bites at any foe that approaches the Pokémon from behind.

name: Pineco
descriptionX: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn’t bother it.
descriptionY: It spits out a fluid that it uses to glue tree bark to its body. The fluid hardens when it touches air.

name: Forretress
descriptionX: It’s usually found hanging on to a fat tree trunk. It shoots out bits of its shell when it sees action.
descriptionY: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside this shell is a total mystery.

name: Dunsparce
descriptionX: It creates mazes in dark locations. When spotted, it flees into the ground by digging with its tail.
descriptionY: If spotted, it escapes by burrowing with its tail. It can float just slightly using its wings.

name: Gligar
descriptionX: Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were sliding. This Pokémon hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then injects the prey with its poison barb.
descriptionY: Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were sliding. This Pokémon hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then injects the prey with its poison barb.

name: Steelix
descriptionX: It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.
descriptionY: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.

name: Mega Steelix
descriptionX: Steelix lives even further underground than Onix. This Pokémon is known to dig toward the earth’s core. There are records of this Pokémon reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
descriptionY: Steelix lives even further underground than Onix. This Pokémon is known to dig toward the earth’s core. There are records of this Pokémon reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.

name: Snubbull
descriptionX: It grows close to others easily and is also easily spoiled. The disparity between its face and its actions makes many young people wild about it.
descriptionY: In contrast to its appearance, it’s quite timid. When playing with other puppy Pokémon, it sometimes gets bullied.

name: Granbull
descriptionX: While it has powerful jaws, it doesn’t care for disputes, so it rarely has a chance to display their might.
descriptionY: Although it’s popular with young people, Granbull is timid and sensitive, so it’s totally incompetent as a watchdog.

name: Qwilfish
descriptionX: Be cautious if this Pokémon starts sucking in water—it will soon attack by scattering the toxic spikes that grow all over its body.
descriptionY: Experienced fishers say they try to catch Qwilfish in the brief moment that these Pokémon become defenseless just after launching poisonous spikes.

name: Hisuian Qwilfish
descriptionX: Fishers detest this troublesome Pokémon because it sprays poison from its spines, getting it everywhere. A different form of Qwilfish lives in other regions.
descriptionY: Fishers detest this troublesome Pokémon because it sprays poison from its spines, getting it everywhere. A different form of Qwilfish lives in other regions.

name: Scizor
descriptionX: This Pokémon’s pincers, which contain steel, can crush any hard object they get ahold of into bits.
descriptionY: It swings its eye-patterned pincers up to scare its foes. This makes it look like it has three heads.

name: Mega Scizor
descriptionX: It stores the excess energy from Mega Evolution, so after a long time passes, its body starts to melt.
descriptionY: It’s better at beating things than grasping them. When it battles for a long time, the weight of its pincers becomes too much to bear.

name: Shuckle
descriptionX: It stores berries inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.
descriptionY: The berries stored in its vaselike shell eventually become a thick, pulpy juice.

name: Heracross
descriptionX: It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the nectar to itself, it hurls rivals away with its prized horn.
descriptionY: With its herculean powers, it can easily throw around an object that is 100 times its own weight.

name: Mega Heracross
descriptionX: It can grip things with its two horns and lift 500 times its own body weight.
descriptionY: A tremendous influx of energy builds it up, but when Mega Evolution ends, Heracross is bothered by terrible soreness in its muscles.

name: Sneasel
descriptionX: This cunning Pokémon hides under the cover of darkness, waiting to attack its prey.
descriptionY: This is a smart and sneaky Pokémon. A pair may work together to steal eggs by having one lure the parents away.

name: Hisuian Sneasel
descriptionX: Its sturdy, curved claws are ideal for traversing precipitous cliffs. From the tips of these claws drips a venom that infiltrates the nerves of any prey caught in Sneasel’s grasp.
descriptionY: Its sturdy, curved claws are ideal for traversing precipitous cliffs. From the tips of these claws drips a venom that infiltrates the nerves of any prey caught in Sneasel’s grasp.

name: Teddiursa
descriptionX: This Pokémon discreetly follows Combee to find their hive. It scoops up big dollops of honey in its palms to eat.
descriptionY: Its paws are soaked in oodles of honey. When nervous, Teddiursa will lick its paws and soon have a smile back on its face.

name: Ursaring
descriptionX: It usually wears a hardened expression, but when it’s licking up honey—which it loves—the joy it feels will cause it to break into a wide grin.
descriptionY: It is quite skilled at climbing trees. If it comes across a Primeape while searching for berries in the treetops, trouble will surely ensue.

name: Slugma
