descriptionX: Molten magma courses throughout Slugma’s circulatory system. If this Pokémon is chilled, the magma cools and hardens. Its body turns brittle and chunks fall off, reducing its size.
descriptionY: Slugma does not have any blood in its body. Instead, intensely hot magma circulates throughout this Pokémon’s body, carrying essential nutrients and oxygen to its organs.

name: Magcargo
descriptionX: Magcargo’s shell is actually its skin that hardened as a result of cooling. Its shell is very brittle and fragile—just touching it causes it to crumble apart. This Pokémon returns to its original size by dipping itself in magma.
descriptionY: Magcargo’s body temperature is approximately 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. Water is vaporized on contact. If this Pokémon is caught in the rain, the raindrops instantly turn into steam, cloaking the area in a thick fog.

name: Swinub
descriptionX: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
descriptionY: If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma.

name: Piloswine
descriptionX: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.
descriptionY: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.

name: Corsola
descriptionX: Many live in the clean seas of the south. They apparently can’t live in polluted waters.
descriptionY: Many live in the clean seas of the south. They apparently can’t live in polluted waters.

name: Galarian Corsola
descriptionX: Watch your step when wandering areas oceans once covered. What looks like a stone could be this Pokémon, and it will curse you if you kick it.
descriptionY: Sudden climate change wiped out this ancient kind of Corsola. This Pokémon absorbs others’ life-force through its branches.

name: Remoraid
descriptionX: The water they shoot from their mouths can hit moving prey from more than 300 feet away.
descriptionY: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a Mantine’s underside to scavenge for leftovers.

name: Octillery
descriptionX: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.
descriptionY: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

name: Delibird
descriptionX: It carries food all day long. There are tales about lost people who were saved by the food it had.
descriptionY: It always carries its food with it, wherever it goes. If attacked, it throws its food at the opponent.

name: Mantine
descriptionX: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can jump out above the waves and glide for over 300 feet.
descriptionY: As it majestically swims, it doesn’t care if Remoraid attach to it to scavenge for its leftovers.

name: Skarmory
descriptionX: The pointed feathers of these Pokémon are sharper than swords. Skarmory and Corviknight fight viciously over territory.
descriptionY: People fashion swords from Skarmory’s shed feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element in heraldic designs.

name: Houndour
descriptionX: It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It uses a variety of cries for communicating with others.
descriptionY: It uses different kinds of cries for communicating with others of its kind and for pursuing its prey.

name: Houndoom
descriptionX: If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its mouth, the pain will never go away.
descriptionY: Upon hearing its eerie howls, other Pokémon get the shivers and head straight back to their nests.

name: Mega Houndoom
descriptionX: Its red claws and the tips of its tail are melting from high internal temperatures that are painful to Houndoom itself.
descriptionY: Houndoom’s entire body generates heat when it Mega Evolves. Its fearsome fiery breath turns its opponents to ash.

name: Kingdra
descriptionX: With the arrival of a storm at sea, this Pokémon will show itself on the surface. When a Kingdra and a Dragonite meet, a fierce battle ensues.
descriptionY: Scales shed by this Pokémon have such a splendorous gleam to them that they’ve been given to royalty as gifts.

name: Phanpy
descriptionX: This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverbank. After playing in the mud, it won’t be able to settle down unless it washes its body.
descriptionY: It is far stronger than it appears. If a Phanpy is swinging its trunk around and your arm gets hit by it, your arm bone will shatter.

name: Donphan
descriptionX: Donphan is covered in tough hide, so even being hit by a car won’t faze this Pokémon. However, it is extremely susceptible to rain.
descriptionY: Donphan is normally a calm Pokémon, but once it is enraged, it will curl its body into a ball and charge at you while rolling.

name: Porygon2
descriptionX: This is a Porygon that was updated with special data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about many different subjects all on its own.
descriptionY: After artificial intelligence was implemented in Porygon2, the Pokémon began using a strange language that only other Porygon2 understand.

name: Stantler
descriptionX: This Pokémon apparently used to live in much harsher environments, and thus it once had stronger psychic powers than it does now.
descriptionY: It’s said that this Pokémon used to be stronger long ago when it had many enemies, and that it was even able to evolve under its own power.

name: Smeargle
descriptionX: The fluid of Smeargle’s tail secretions changes in the intensity of its hue as the Pokémon’s emotions change.
descriptionY: It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol, Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.

name: Tyrogue
descriptionX: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
descriptionY: Even though it is small, it can’t be ignored because it will slug any handy target without warning.

name: Hitmontop
descriptionX: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.
descriptionY: After doing a handstand to throw off the opponent’s timing, it presents its fancy kick moves.

name: Smoochum
descriptionX: If its face gets even slightly dirty, Smoochum will bathe immediately. But if its body gets dirty, Smoochum doesn’t really seem to care.
descriptionY: This is a very curious Pokémon. Smoochum decides what it likes and dislikes by touching things with its lips.

name: Elekid
descriptionX: When a storm approaches, this Pokémon gets restless. Once Elekid hears the sound of thunder, it gets full-on rowdy.
descriptionY: It’s not good at storing electricity yet. This Pokémon sneaks into people’s homes, looking for electrical outlets to eat electricity from.

name: Magby
descriptionX: This Pokémon is still small and timid. Whenever Magby gets excited or surprised, flames leak from its mouth and its nose.
descriptionY: This Pokémon makes its home near volcanoes. At the end of the day, Magby soaks in magma, resting and recovering from the day’s fatigue.

name: Miltank
descriptionX: Miltank produces highly nutritious milk, so it’s been supporting the lives of people and other Pokémon since ancient times.
descriptionY: This Pokémon needs to be milked every day, or else it will fall ill. The flavor of Miltank milk changes with the seasons.

name: Blissey
descriptionX: Anyone who takes even one taste of Blissey’s egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant to everyone.
descriptionY: The eggs it lays are filled with happiness. Eating even one bite will bring a smile to anyone.

name: Raikou
descriptionX: Raikou embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of this Pokémon send shock waves shuddering through the air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come crashing down.
descriptionY: Raikou embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of this Pokémon send shock waves shuddering through the air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come crashing down.

name: Entei
descriptionX: Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.
descriptionY: Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.

name: Suicune
descriptionX: Suicune embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water. It runs across the land with gracefulness. This Pokémon has the power to purify dirty water.
descriptionY: Suicune embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water. It runs across the land with gracefulness. This Pokémon has the power to purify dirty water.

name: Larvitar
descriptionX: Born deep underground, this Pokémon becomes a pupa after eating enough dirt to make a mountain.
descriptionY: It is born deep underground. It can’t emerge until it has entirely consumed the soil around it.

name: Pupitar
descriptionX: This pupa flies around wildly by venting with great force the gas pressurized inside its body.
descriptionY: Its shell is as hard as bedrock, and it is also very strong. Its thrashing can topple a mountain.

name: Tyranitar
descriptionX: Extremely strong, it can change the landscape. It is so insolent that it doesn’t care about others.
descriptionY: In just one of its mighty hands, it has the power to make the ground shake and mountains crumble.

name: Mega Tyranitar
descriptionX: Due to the colossal power poured into it, this Pokémon’s back split right open. Its destructive instincts are the only thing keeping it moving.
descriptionY: The effects of Mega Evolution make it more ferocious than ever. It’s unclear whether it can even hear its Trainer’s orders.

name: Lugia
descriptionX: Lugia’s wings pack devastating power—a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, this Pokémon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.
descriptionY: Lugia’s wings pack devastating power—a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, this Pokémon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.

name: Ho-Oh
descriptionX: Ho-Oh’s feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring happiness to the bearers. This Pokémon is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.
descriptionY: Ho-Oh’s feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring happiness to the bearers. This Pokémon is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.

name: Celebi
descriptionX: This Pokémon came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as Celebi appears, a bright and shining future awaits us.
descriptionY: This Pokémon came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as Celebi appears, a bright and shining future awaits us.

name: Treecko
descriptionX: Treecko has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. This Pokémon attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.
descriptionY: Treecko is cool, calm, and collected—it never panics under any situation. If a bigger foe were to glare at this Pokémon, it would glare right back without conceding an inch of ground.

name: Grovyle
descriptionX: The leaves growing out of Grovyle’s body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This Pokémon is a master at climbing trees in jungles.
descriptionY: This Pokémon adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees. In a forest, no Pokémon can ever hope to catch a fleeing Grovyle however fast they may be.

name: Sceptile
descriptionX: The leaves growing on Sceptile’s body are very sharp edged. This Pokémon is very agile—it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
descriptionY: Sceptile has seeds growing on its back. They are said to be bursting with nutrients that revitalize trees. This Pokémon raises the trees in a forest with loving care.

name: Mega Sceptile
descriptionX: The leaves growing on Sceptile’s body are very sharp edged. This Pokémon is very agile—it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
descriptionY: Sceptile has seeds growing on its back. They are said to be bursting with nutrients that revitalize trees. This Pokémon raises the trees in a forest with loving care.

name: Torchic
descriptionX: Torchic sticks with its Trainer, following behind with unsteady steps. This Pokémon breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit, including fireballs that leave the foe scorched black.
descriptionY: Torchic has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame. Give it a hug—it will be glowing with warmth. This Pokémon is covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.

name: Combusken
descriptionX: Combusken toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This Pokémon’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out 10 kicks in one second.
descriptionY: Combusken battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This Pokémon’s cry is very loud and distracting.

name: Blaziken
descriptionX: In battle, Blaziken blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this Pokémon’s wrists burn.
descriptionY: Blaziken has incredibly strong legs—it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon’s blazing punches leave its foes scorched and blackened.

name: Mega Blaziken
descriptionX: In battle, Blaziken blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this Pokémon’s wrists burn.
descriptionY: Blaziken has incredibly strong legs—it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon’s blazing punches leave its foes scorched and blackened.

name: Mudkip
descriptionX: The fin on Mudkip’s head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this Pokémon can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.
descriptionY: In water, Mudkip breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is faced with a tight situation in battle, this Pokémon will unleash its amazing power—it can crush rocks bigger than itself.

name: Marshtomp
descriptionX: The surface of Marshtomp’s body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This Pokémon plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.
descriptionY: Marshtomp is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at swimming. This Pokémon’s hindquarters exhibit obvious development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.

name: Swampert
descriptionX: Swampert is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This Pokémon also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
descriptionY: Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is approaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.

name: Mega Swampert
descriptionX: Swampert is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This Pokémon also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
descriptionY: Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is approaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.

name: Poochyena
descriptionX: At first sight, Poochyena takes a bite at anything that moves. This Pokémon chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.
descriptionY: Poochyena is an omnivore—it will eat anything. A distinguishing feature is how large its fangs are compared to its body. This Pokémon tries to intimidate its foes by making the hair on its tail bristle out.

name: Mightyena
descriptionX: Mightyena gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This Pokémon will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.
descriptionY: Mightyena travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory of its life in the wild compels the Pokémon to obey only those Trainers that it recognizes to possess superior skill.

name: Zigzagoon
descriptionX: It walks in zigzag fashion. It’s good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
descriptionY: It walks in zigzag fashion. It’s good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.

name: Galarian Zigzagoon
descriptionX: Its restlessness has it constantly running around. If it sees another Pokémon, it will purposely run into them in order to start a fight.
descriptionY: Thought to be the oldest form of Zigzagoon, it moves in zigzags and wreaks havoc upon its surroundings.

name: Linoone
descriptionX: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
descriptionY: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.

name: Galarian Linoone
descriptionX: It uses its long tongue to taunt opponents. Once the opposition is enraged, this Pokémon hurls itself at the opponent, tackling them forcefully.
descriptionY: This very aggressive Pokémon will recklessly challenge opponents stronger than itself.

name: Wurmple
descriptionX: Using the spikes on its rear end, Wurmple peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This Pokémon’s feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.
descriptionY: Wurmple is targeted by Swellow as prey. This Pokémon will try to resist by pointing the spikes on its rear at the attacking predator. It will weaken the foe by leaking poison from the spikes.

name: Silcoon
descriptionX: Silcoon tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There, this Pokémon hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.
descriptionY: Silcoon was thought to endure hunger and not consume anything before its evolution. However, it is now thought that this Pokémon slakes its thirst by drinking rainwater that collects on its silk.

name: Beautifly
descriptionX: Beautifly’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this Pokémon, just leave a potted flower by an open window. Beautifly is sure to come looking for pollen.
descriptionY: Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This Pokémon rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.

name: Cascoon
descriptionX: Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This Pokémon prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
descriptionY: If it is attacked, Cascoon remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body would be weak upon evolution. This Pokémon will also not forget the pain it endured.

name: Dustox
descriptionX: Dustox is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this Pokémon are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.
descriptionY: When Dustox flaps its wings, a fine dust is scattered all over. This dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make a pro wrestler sick. This Pokémon searches for food using its antennae like radar.

name: Lotad
descriptionX: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.
descriptionY: Its leaf grew too large for it to live on land. That is how it began to live floating in the water.

name: Lombre
descriptionX: It is nocturnal and becomes active at nightfall. It feeds on aquatic mosses that grow in the riverbed.
descriptionY: It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and becomes active at night.

name: Ludicolo
descriptionX: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo’s cells, making it more powerful.
descriptionY: If it hears festive music, it begins moving in rhythm in order to amplify its power.

name: Seedot
descriptionX: If it remains still, it looks just like a real nut. It delights in surprising foraging Pokémon.
descriptionY: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.

name: Nuzleaf
descriptionX: It lives deep in forests. With the leaf on its head, it makes a flute whose song makes listeners uneasy.
descriptionY: They live in holes bored in large trees. The sound of Nuzleaf’s grass flute fills listeners with dread.

name: Shiftry
descriptionX: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.
descriptionY: It lives quietly in the deep forest. It is said to create chilly winter winds with the fans it holds.

name: Taillow
descriptionX: Taillow courageously stands its ground against foes, however strong they may be. This gutsy Pokémon will remain defiant even after a loss. On the other hand, it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.
descriptionY: Taillow is young—it has only just left its nest. As a result, it sometimes becomes lonesome and cries at night. This Pokémon feeds on Wurmple that live in forests.

name: Swellow
descriptionX: Swellow flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This Pokémon dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by Swellow’s clawed feet, preventing escape.
descriptionY: Swellow is very conscientious about the upkeep of its glossy wings. Once two Swellow are gathered, they diligently take care of cleaning each other’s wings.

name: Wingull
descriptionX: It soars high in the sky, riding on updrafts like a glider. It carries food tucked in its bill.
descriptionY: It rides upon ocean winds as if it were a glider. In the winter, it hides food around its nest.

name: Pelipper
descriptionX: It is a flying transporter that carries small Pokémon in its beak. It bobs on the waves to rest its wings.
descriptionY: It protects its young in its beak. It bobs on waves, resting on them on days when the waters are calm.

name: Ralts
descriptionX: The horns on its head provide a strong power that enables it to sense people’s emotions.
descriptionY: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.

name: Kirlia
descriptionX: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.
descriptionY: The cheerful spirit of its Trainer gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.

name: Gardevoir
descriptionX: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
descriptionY: It unleashes psychokinetic energy at full power when protecting a Trainer it has bonded closely with.

name: Mega Gardevoir
descriptionX: Gardevoir has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its Trainer, this Pokémon is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.
descriptionY: Gardevoir has the psychokinetic power to distort the dimensions and create a small black hole. This Pokémon will try to protect its Trainer even at the risk of its own life.

name: Surskit
descriptionX: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.
descriptionY: It secretes a thick, sweet-scented syrup from the tip of its head. It lives on weed-choked ponds.

name: Masquerain
descriptionX: It flaps its four wings to hover and fly freely in any direction—to and fro and sideways.
descriptionY: The antennae have distinctive patterns that look like eyes. When it rains, they grow heavy, making flight impossible.

name: Shroomish
descriptionX: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.
descriptionY: If it senses danger, it scatters spores from the top of its head to protect itself.

name: Breloom
descriptionX: It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerful punches while its foe is hampered by inhaled spores.
descriptionY: The seeds on its tail are made of toxic spores. It knocks out foes with quick, virtually invisible punches.

name: Slakoth
descriptionX: It sleeps for 20 hours every day. Making drowsy those that see it is one of its abilities.
descriptionY: The way Slakoth lolls around makes anyone who watches it feel like doing the same.

name: Vigoroth
descriptionX: Its stress level rises if it cannot keep moving constantly. Too much stress makes it feel sick.
descriptionY: It is always hungry because it won’t stop rampaging. Even while it is eating, it can’t keep still.

name: Slaking
descriptionX: It is the world’s most slothful Pokémon. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.
descriptionY: This Pokémon lives lying on its side. It only rolls over and moves when there is no more grass to eat.

name: Nincada
descriptionX: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.
descriptionY: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.

name: Ninjask
descriptionX: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.
descriptionY: This Pokémon is so quick, it is said to be able to avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.

name: Shedinja
descriptionX: A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.
descriptionY: A strange Pokémon—it flies without moving its wings, has a hollow shell for a body, and does not breathe.

name: Whismur
descriptionX: The cry of a Whismur is over 100 decibels. If you’re close to a Whismur when it lets out a cry, you’ll be stuck with an all-day headache.
descriptionY: When Whismur cries, the sound of its own voice startles it, making the Pokémon cry even louder. It cries until it’s exhausted, then it falls asleep.

name: Loudred
descriptionX: Loudred’s ears serve as speakers, and they can put out sound waves powerful enough to blow away a house.
descriptionY: The force of this Pokémon’s loud voice isn’t just the sound—it’s also the wave of air pressure that blows opponents away and damages them.

name: Exploud
descriptionX: In the past, people would use the loud voices of these Pokémon as a means of communication between distant cities.
descriptionY: This Pokémon can do more than just shout. To communicate with others of its kind, it’ll emit all sorts of sounds from the holes in its body.

name: Makuhita
descriptionX: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy Pokémon that can withstand any attack.
descriptionY: It toughens up by slamming into thick trees over and over. It gains a sturdy body and dauntless spirit.

name: Hariyama
descriptionX: It loves challenging others to tests of strength. It has the power to stop a train with a slap.
descriptionY: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.

name: Azurill
descriptionX: Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It flings that tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.
descriptionY: Its tail is packed full of the nutrients it needs to grow.

name: Nosepass
descriptionX: It moves less than an inch a year, but when it’s in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.
descriptionY: It hunts without twitching a muscle by pulling in its prey with powerful magnetism. But sometimes it pulls natural enemies in close.

name: Skitty
descriptionX: Skitty has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objects and chasing them around. This Pokémon is known to chase after its own tail and become dizzy.
descriptionY: Skitty is known to chase around playfully after its own tail. In the wild, this Pokémon lives in holes in the trees of forests. It is very popular as a pet because of its adorable looks.

name: Delcatty
descriptionX: Delcatty prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. Because this Pokémon eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.
descriptionY: Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon will never fight—it will just move away somewhere else.

name: Sableye
descriptionX: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.
descriptionY: Materials from gems it has eaten float to the surface of its body and can form an infinite number of patterns among individuals.

name: Mega Sableye
descriptionX: Bathed in the energy of Mega Evolution, the gemstone on its chest expands, rips through its skin, and falls out.
descriptionY: It blocks any and all attacks with its giant-sized gemstone. However, the stone’s a heavy burden, and it limits Mega Sableye’s movements.

name: Mawile
descriptionX: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
descriptionY: It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed.

name: Mega Mawile
descriptionX: It has an extremely vicious disposition. It grips prey in its two sets of jaws and tears them apart with raw power.
descriptionY: Its two sets of jaws thrash about violently as if they each had a will of their own. One gnash from them can turn a boulder to dust.

name: Aron
descriptionX: It eats iron ore—and sometimes railroad tracks— to build up the steel armor that protects its body.
descriptionY: When Aron evolves, its steel armor peels off. In ancient times, people would collect Aron’s shed armor and make good use of it in their daily lives.

name: Lairon
descriptionX: Lairon live in mountains brimming with spring water and iron ore, so these Pokémon often came into conflict with humans in the past.
descriptionY: During territorial disputes, Lairon fight by slamming into each other. Close inspection of their steel armor reveals scratches and dents.

name: Aggron
descriptionX: Aggron has a horn sharp enough to perforate thick iron sheets. It brings down its opponents by ramming into them horn first.
descriptionY: Long ago, there was a king who wore a helmet meant to resemble the head of an Aggron. He was trying to channel the Pokémon’s strength.

name: Mega Aggron
descriptionX: Aggron claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. This Pokémon vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.
descriptionY: Aggron is protective of its environment. If its mountain is ravaged by a landslide or a fire, this Pokémon will haul topsoil to the area, plant trees, and beautifully restore its own territory.

name: Meditite
descriptionX: It never skips its daily yoga training. It heightens its inner strength through meditation.
descriptionY: It meditates to heighten its inner energy and to float in the air. It eats one berry a day.

name: Medicham
descriptionX: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe’s next move.
descriptionY: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.

name: Mega Medicham
descriptionX: It is said that through meditation, Medicham heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This Pokémon hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.
descriptionY: Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed its sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon is known to meditate for a whole month without eating.

name: Electrike
descriptionX: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.
descriptionY: It stores electricity in its fur. It gives off sparks from all over its body in seasons when the air is dry.

name: Manectric
descriptionX: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.
descriptionY: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.

name: Mega Manectric
descriptionX: Mega Evolution fills its body with a tremendous amount of electricity, but it’s too much for Manectric to fully control.
descriptionY: Too much electricity has built up in its body, irritating Manectric. Its explosive speed is equal to that of a lightning bolt.

name: Plusle
descriptionX: Plusle always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. Whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, this Pokémon shorts out its body to create the crackling noises of sparks to show its joy.
descriptionY: When Plusle is cheering on its partner, it flashes with electric sparks from all over its body. If its partner loses, this Pokémon cries loudly.

name: Minun
descriptionX: Minun is more concerned about cheering on its partners than its own safety. It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of sparks to cheer on its teammates.
descriptionY: Minun loves to cheer on its partner in battle. It gives off sparks from its body while it is doing so. If its partner is in trouble, this Pokémon gives off increasing amounts of sparks.

name: Volbeat
descriptionX: With the arrival of night, Volbeat emits light from its tail. It communicates with others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light. This Pokémon is attracted by the sweet aroma of Illumise.
descriptionY: Volbeat’s tail glows like a lightbulb. With other Volbeat, it uses its tail to draw geometric shapes in the night sky. This Pokémon loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.

name: Illumise
descriptionX: Illumise attracts a swarm of Volbeat using a sweet fragrance. Once the Volbeat have gathered, this Pokémon leads the lit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas of the night sky.
descriptionY: Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in the night sky. This Pokémon is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.

name: Roselia
descriptionX: Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance. The stronger its aroma, the healthier the Roselia is.
descriptionY: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.

name: Gulpin
descriptionX: There is nothing its stomach can’t digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.
descriptionY: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach comprises most of its body, with enzymes to dissolve anything.

name: Swalot
descriptionX: It gulps anything that fits in its mouth. Its special enzymes can dissolve anything.
descriptionY: It can swallow a tire whole in one gulp. It secretes a horribly toxic fluid from the pores on its body.

name: Carvanha
descriptionX: It won’t attack while it’s alone—not even if it spots prey. Instead, it waits for other Carvanha to join it, and then the Pokémon attack as a group.
descriptionY: These Pokémon have sharp fangs and powerful jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.

name: Sharpedo
descriptionX: As soon as it catches the scent of prey, Sharpedo will jet seawater from its backside, hurtling toward the target to attack at 75 mph.
descriptionY: This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sea. Any ship entering the waters Sharpedo calls home will be attacked—no exceptions.

name: Mega Sharpedo
descriptionX: The yellow patterns it bears are old scars. The energy from Mega Evolution runs through them, causing it sharp pain and suffering.
descriptionY: The moment it charges into its opponent, sharp spikes pop out of Sharpedo’s head, leaving its opponent with deep wounds.

name: Wailmer
descriptionX: It shows off by spraying jets of seawater from the nostrils above its eyes. It eats a solid ton of Wishiwashi every day.
descriptionY: When it sucks in a large volume of seawater, it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton of food daily.

name: Wailord
descriptionX: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.
descriptionY: Its immense size is the reason for its popularity. Wailord watching is a favorite sightseeing activity in various parts of the world.

name: Numel
descriptionX: Magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. When it grows cold, the magma hardens and slows it.
descriptionY: The flaming magma it stores in the hump on its back is the source of its tremendous power.

name: Camerupt
descriptionX: It lives in the crater of a volcano. It is well known that the humps on its back erupt every 10 years.
descriptionY: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.

name: Mega Camerupt
descriptionX: Camerupt has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this Pokémon’s back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.
descriptionY: The humps on Camerupt’s back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.

name: Torkoal
descriptionX: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
descriptionY: Coal is the source of Torkoal’s energy. Large amounts of coal can be found in the mountains where they live.

name: Spoink
descriptionX: Spoink will die if it stops bouncing. The pearl on its head amplifies its psychic powers.
descriptionY: Using its tail like a spring, it keeps its heart beating by bouncing constantly. If it stops, it dies.

name: Grumpig
descriptionX: It can perform odd dance steps to influence foes. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.
descriptionY: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does a strange dance to control foes’ minds.

name: Spinda
descriptionX: Its steps are shaky and stumbling. Walking for a long time makes it feel sick.
descriptionY: Each Spinda’s spot pattern is different. With its stumbling movements, it evades opponents’ attacks brilliantly!

name: Trapinch
descriptionX: Its nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit in the desert. Once something has fallen in, there is no escape.
descriptionY: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.

name: Vibrava
descriptionX: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
descriptionY: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.

name: Flygon
descriptionX: This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.
descriptionY: It is nicknamed the Desert Spirit because the flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.

name: Cacnea
descriptionX: It prefers harsh environments, such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.
descriptionY: It lives in arid locations. Its yellow flowers bloom once a year.

name: Cacturne
descriptionX: Packs of them follow travelers through the desert until the travelers can no longer move.
descriptionY: It lives in deserts. It becomes active at night when it hunts for prey exhausted from the desert’s heat.

name: Swablu
descriptionX: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
descriptionY: It can’t relax if it or its surroundings are not clean. It wipes off dirt with its wings.

name: Altaria
descriptionX: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.
descriptionY: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.

name: Mega Altaria
descriptionX: Altaria dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this Pokémon makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.
descriptionY: Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton clouds. This Pokémon catches updrafts with its buoyant wings and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.

name: Zangoose
descriptionX: It’s Seviper’s archrival. To threaten those it encounters, it fans out the claws on its front paws.
descriptionY: If it comes across a Seviper, its fur bristles and it assumes its battle pose. Its sharp claws are its best weapon.

name: Seviper
descriptionX: It sharpens its swordlike tail on hard rocks. It hides in tall grass and strikes unwary prey with venomous fangs.
descriptionY: Constant polishing makes the edge of the blade on its tail extremely sharp. It’s Zangoose’s archrival.

name: Lunatone
descriptionX: The phase of the moon apparently has some effect on its power. It’s active on the night of a full moon.
descriptionY: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.

name: Solrock
descriptionX: When it rotates itself, it gives off light similar to the sun, thus blinding its foes.
descriptionY: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.

name: Barboach
descriptionX: Its two whiskers provide a sensitive radar. Even in muddy waters, it can detect its prey’s location.
descriptionY: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.

name: Whiscash
descriptionX: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.
descriptionY: Sighting Whiscash leaping from the water is believed to herald an earthquake.

name: Corphish
descriptionX: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
descriptionY: It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.

name: Crawdaunt
descriptionX: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.
descriptionY: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.

name: Baltoy
descriptionX: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.
descriptionY: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.

name: Claydol
descriptionX: This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.
descriptionY: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.

name: Lileep
descriptionX: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. Lileep once lived in warm seas that existed approximately 100,000,000 years ago.
descriptionY: Lileep clings to rocks on the seabed. When prey comes close, this Pokémon entangles it with petallike tentacles.

name: Cradily
descriptionX: It has short legs and can’t walk very fast, but its neck and tentacles can extend to over three times their usual length to nab distant prey.
descriptionY: Once Cradily catches prey in its tentacles, it digests them whole and absorbs their nutrients.

name: Anorith
descriptionX: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. Anorith lived in the ocean about 100,000,000 years ago, hunting with its pair of claws.
descriptionY: Anorith can swim swiftly by pulling its eight wings through the water like oars on a boat. This Pokémon is an ancestor of modern bug Pokémon.

name: Armaldo
descriptionX: After evolution, this Pokémon emerged onto land. Its lower body has become stronger, and blows from its tail are devastating.
descriptionY: Though it lives on land, it’s also a good swimmer. It dives into the ocean in search of prey, using its sharp claws to take down its quarry.

name: Feebas
descriptionX: Although unattractive and unpopular, this Pokémon’s marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.
descriptionY: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.

name: Milotic
descriptionX: Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokémon of all.
descriptionY: It’s said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.

name: Castform
descriptionX: Although its form changes with the weather, that is apparently the result of a chemical reaction and not the result of its own free will.
descriptionY: Its form changes depending on the weather. The rougher conditions get, the rougher Castform’s disposition!

name: Kecleon
descriptionX: It changes its hue to blend into its surroundings. If no one takes notice of it for too long, it will pout and never reveal itself.
descriptionY: Its color changes for concealment and also when its mood or health changes. The darker the color, the healthier it is.

name: Shuppet
descriptionX: It loves to feed on feelings like envy and malice. Its upright horn catches the emotions of people.
descriptionY: It feeds on the dark emotions of sadness and hatred, which make it grow steadily stronger.

name: Banette
descriptionX: This Pokémon developed from an abandoned doll that amassed a grudge. It is seen in dark alleys.
descriptionY: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a Pokémon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.

name: Mega Banette
descriptionX: Extraordinary energy amplifies its cursing power to such an extent that it can’t help but curse its own Trainer.
descriptionY: Mega Evolution increases its vindictiveness, and the cursing power that was held back by its zipper comes spilling out.

name: Duskull
descriptionX: If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their parents, it will spirit them away—or so it’s said.
descriptionY: Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.

name: Dusclops
descriptionX: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.
descriptionY: It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.

name: Tropius
descriptionX: It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows twice a year.
descriptionY: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.

name: Chimecho
descriptionX: Chimecho makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this Pokémon becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.
descriptionY: In high winds, Chimecho cries as it hangs from a tree branch or the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This Pokémon plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.

name: Absol
descriptionX: Swift as the wind, Absol races through fields and mountains. Its curved, bow-like horn is acutely sensitive to the warning signs of natural disasters.
descriptionY: Because of this Pokémon’s ability to detect danger, people mistook Absol as a bringer of doom.

name: Mega Absol
descriptionX: Normally, it dislikes fighting, so it really hates changing to this form for battles.
descriptionY: It converts the energy from Mega Evolution into an intimidating aura. Fainthearted people expire from shock at the sight of it.

name: Wynaut
descriptionX: It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash against one another to toughen their spirits.
descriptionY: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.

name: Snorunt
descriptionX: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
descriptionY: It is said that a home visited by a Snorunt will prosper. It can withstand cold of −150 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Glalie
descriptionX: Its prey is instantaneously frozen stiff by the cold air it exhales from its huge mouth. While they’re in that frozen state, it gobbles them up.
descriptionY: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.

name: Mega Glalie
descriptionX: When it spews stupendously cold air from its broken mouth, the entire area around it gets whited out.
descriptionY: The power of Mega Evolution was so strong that it smashed Glalie’s jaw. Its inability to eat very well leaves Glalie irritated.

name: Spheal
descriptionX: This Pokémon’s body is covered in blubber and impressively round. It’s faster for Spheal to roll around than walk.
descriptionY: As it drifts among the waves, Spheal probes the sea. As soon as it spots prey, it informs the Walrein in its herd.

name: Sealeo
descriptionX: Sealeo live on top of drift ice. They go swimming when they’re on the hunt, seeking out their prey by scent.
descriptionY: This Pokémon has a habit of spinning round things on its nose, whether those things are Poké Balls or Spheal.

name: Walrein
descriptionX: Walrein form herds of 20 to 30 individuals. When a threat appears, the herd’s leader will protect the group with its life.
descriptionY: Walrein’s tusks keep growing throughout its life. Tusks broken in battle will grow back to their usual impressive size in a year.

name: Clamperl
descriptionX: Despite its appearance, it’s carnivorous. It clamps down on its prey with both sides of its shell and doesn’t let go until they stop moving.
descriptionY: Clamperl’s pearls are exceedingly precious. They can be more than 10 times as costly as Shellder’s pearls.

name: Huntail
descriptionX: It’s not the strongest swimmer. It wags its tail to lure in its prey and then gulps them down as soon as they get close.
descriptionY: Deep seas are their habitat. According to tradition, when Huntail wash up onshore, something unfortunate will happen.

name: Gorebyss
descriptionX: The color of its body changes with the water temperature. The coloration of Gorebyss in Alola is almost blindingly vivid.
descriptionY: It sucks bodily fluids out of its prey. The leftover meat sinks to the seafloor, where it becomes food for other Pokémon.

name: Relicanth
descriptionX: Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bladders allow this Pokémon to survive the intense water pressure of the deep sea.
descriptionY: This Pokémon was discovered during deep-sea exploration. Its appearance hasn’t changed in 100,000,000 years, so it’s called a living fossil.

name: Luvdisc
descriptionX: Its heart-shaped body makes it popular. In some places, you would give a Luvdisc to someone you love.
descriptionY: During the spawning season, countless Luvdisc congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.

name: Bagon
descriptionX: Its steel-hard head can shatter boulders. It longingly hopes for wings to grow so it can fly.
descriptionY: Its belief that it will be able to fly one day is apparently the influence of information carried in its genes.

name: Shelgon
descriptionX: The cells within its shell transform with explosive speed, preparing it for evolution.
descriptionY: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.

name: Salamence
descriptionX: It flies around on its wings, which have grown in at last. In its happiness, it gushes hot flames, burning up everything it passes over.
descriptionY: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.

name: Mega Salamence
descriptionX: The stress of its two proud wings becoming misshapen and stuck together because of strong energy makes it go on a rampage.
descriptionY: It puts its forelegs inside its shell to streamline itself for flight. Salamence flies at high speeds over all kinds of topographical features.

name: Beldum
descriptionX: From its rear, Beldum emits a magnetic force that rapidly pulls opponents in. They get skewered on Beldum’s sharp claws.
descriptionY: The cells in this Pokémon’s body are composed of magnetic material. Instead of blood, magnetic forces flow through Beldum’s body.

name: Metang
descriptionX: Two Beldum have become stuck together via their own magnetic forces. With two brains, the resulting Metang has doubled psychic powers.
descriptionY: Using magnetic forces to stay aloft, this Pokémon flies at high speeds, weaving through harsh mountain terrain in pursuit of prey.

name: Metagross
descriptionX: Because the magnetic powers of these Pokémon get stronger in freezing temperatures, Metagross living on snowy mountains are full of energy.
descriptionY: Metagross is the result of the fusion of two Metang. This Pokémon defeats its opponents through use of its supercomputer-level brain.

name: Mega Metagross
descriptionX: Its intellect surpasses its previous level, resulting in battles so cruel, they’ll make you want to cover your eyes.
descriptionY: When it knows it can’t win, it digs the claws on its legs into its opponent and starts the countdown to a big explosion.

name: Regirock
descriptionX: Every bit of Regirock’s body is made of stone. As parts of its body erode, this Pokémon sticks rocks to itself to repair what’s been lost.
descriptionY: Cutting-edge technology was used to study the internals of this Pokémon’s rock body, but nothing was found—not even a brain or a heart.

name: Regice
descriptionX: With cold air that can reach temperatures as low as −328 degrees Fahrenheit, Regice instantly freezes any creature that approaches it.
descriptionY: This Pokémon’s body is made of solid ice. It’s said that Regice was born beneath thick ice in the ice age.

name: Registeel
descriptionX: Registeel’s body is made of a strange material that is flexible enough to stretch and shrink but also more durable than any metal.
descriptionY: It’s rumored that this Pokémon was born deep underground in the planet’s mantle and that it emerged onto the surface 10,000 years ago.

name: Latias
descriptionX: Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this Pokémon ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.
descriptionY: Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down. The Pokémon enfolds its body with its down and refracts light to alter its appearance.

name: Mega Latias
descriptionX: Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this Pokémon ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.
descriptionY: Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down. The Pokémon enfolds its body with its down and refracts light to alter its appearance.

name: Latios
descriptionX: Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This Pokémon is intelligent and understands human speech.
descriptionY: Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a compassionate spirit. This Pokémon can fly faster than a jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.

name: Mega Latios
descriptionX: Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This Pokémon is intelligent and understands human speech.
descriptionY: Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a compassionate spirit. This Pokémon can fly faster than a jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.

name: Kyogre
descriptionX: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.
descriptionY: Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

name: Primal Reversion
descriptionX: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.
descriptionY: Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

name: Groudon
descriptionX: Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.
descriptionY: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to erupt and expand the landmass of the world.

name: Primal Reversion
descriptionX: Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.
descriptionY: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to erupt and expand the landmass of the world.

name: Rayquaza
descriptionX: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.
descriptionY: It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.

name: Mega Rayquaza
descriptionX: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.
descriptionY: It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.

name: Jirachi
descriptionX: A legend states that Jirachi will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this Pokémon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.
descriptionY: Jirachi will awaken from its sleep of a thousand years if you sing to it in a voice of purity. It is said to make true any wish that people desire.

name: Normal Forme
descriptionX: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon’s chest appears to be its brain.
descriptionY: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.

name: Attack Forme
descriptionX: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon’s chest appears to be its brain.
descriptionY: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.

name: Defense Forme
descriptionX: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon’s chest appears to be its brain.
descriptionY: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.

name: Speed Forme
descriptionX: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon’s chest appears to be its brain.
descriptionY: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.

name: Turtwig
descriptionX: Photosynthesis occurs across its body under the sun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.
descriptionY: It undertakes photosynthesis with its body, making oxygen. The leaf on its head wilts if it is thirsty.

name: Grotle
descriptionX: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
descriptionY: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.

name: Torterra
descriptionX: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.
descriptionY: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.

name: Chimchar
descriptionX: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can’t extinguish the fire.
descriptionY: The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end. The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.

name: Monferno
descriptionX: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.
descriptionY: It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks. Its fiery tail is but one weapon.

name: Infernape
descriptionX: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.
descriptionY: It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all its limbs to fight in its own unique style.

name: Piplup
descriptionX: It doesn’t like to be taken care of. It’s difficult to bond with since it won’t listen to its Trainer.
descriptionY: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

name: Prinplup
descriptionX: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.
descriptionY: It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows that can snap even the thickest of trees.

name: Empoleon
descriptionX: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.
descriptionY: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

name: Starly
descriptionX: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.
descriptionY: Because they are weak individually, they form groups. However, they bicker if the group grows too big.

name: Staravia
descriptionX: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.
descriptionY: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.

name: Staraptor
descriptionX: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.
descriptionY: It never stops attacking even if it is injured. It fusses over the shape of its comb.

name: Bidoof
descriptionX: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.
descriptionY: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.

name: Bibarel
descriptionX: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.
descriptionY: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

name: Kricketot
descriptionX: Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.
descriptionY: When its antennae hit each other, it sounds like the music of a xylophone.

name: Kricketune
descriptionX: By allowing its cry to resonate in the hollow of its belly, it produces a captivating sound.
descriptionY: There is a village that hosts a contest based on the amazingly variable cries of this Pokémon.

name: Shinx
descriptionX: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.
descriptionY: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. Its fur glows when it’s in trouble.

name: Luxio
descriptionX: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
descriptionY: By gathering their tails together, they collectively generate powerful electricity from their claws.

name: Luxray
descriptionX: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.
descriptionY: Luxray’s ability to see through objects comes in handy when it’s scouting for danger.

name: Budew
descriptionX: The pollen it releases contains poison. If this Pokémon is raised on clean water, the poison’s toxicity is increased.
descriptionY: This Pokémon is highly sensitive to temperature changes. When its bud starts to open, that means spring is right around the corner.

name: Roserade
descriptionX: After captivating opponents with its sweet scent, it lashes them with its thorny whips.
descriptionY: The poison in its right hand is quick acting. The poison in its left hand is slow acting. Both are life threatening.

name: Cranidos
descriptionX: A primeval Pokémon, it possesses a hard and sturdy skull, lacking any intelligence within.
descriptionY: Its hard skull is its distinguishing feature. It snapped trees by headbutting them, and then it fed on their ripe berries.

name: Rampardos
descriptionX: In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of this Pokémon and use its skull, which is harder than steel, to make helmets.
descriptionY: This ancient Pokémon used headbutts skillfully. Its brain was really small, so some theories suggest that its stupidity led to its extinction.

name: Shieldon
descriptionX: A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokémon, it used its face to dig up tree roots to eat. The skin on its face was plenty tough.
descriptionY: Although its fossils can be found in layers of primeval rock, nothing but its face has ever been discovered.

name: Bastiodon
descriptionX: The bones of its face are huge and hard, so they were mistaken for its spine until after this Pokémon was successfully restored.
descriptionY: This Pokémon is from roughly 100 million years ago. Its terrifyingly tough face is harder than steel.

name: Plant Cloak
descriptionX: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
descriptionY: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.

name: Sandy Cloak
descriptionX: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
descriptionY: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.

name: Trash Cloak
descriptionX: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
descriptionY: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.

name: Plant Cloak
descriptionX: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
descriptionY: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.

name: Sandy Cloak
descriptionX: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
descriptionY: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.

name: Trash Cloak
descriptionX: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
descriptionY: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.

name: Mothim
descriptionX: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.
descriptionY: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.

name: Combee
descriptionX: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a hundred, packed closely together in a lump.
descriptionY: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers nectar from flowers to please Vespiquen.

name: Vespiquen
descriptionX: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.
descriptionY: It raises grubs in the holes in its body. It secretes pheromones to control Combee.

name: Pachirisu
descriptionX: It’s one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.
descriptionY: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.

name: Buizel
descriptionX: It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself through water. The tails also slice clinging seaweed.
descriptionY: It inflates its flotation sac, keeping its face above water in order to watch for prey movement.

name: Floatzel
descriptionX: With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.
descriptionY: It is a common sight around fishing ports. It is known to rescue people and help fishers carry what they caught.

name: Cherubi
descriptionX: It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked by bird Pokémon that would love to make off with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball.
descriptionY: The deeper a Cherubi’s red, the more nutrients it has stockpiled in its body. And the sweeter and tastier its small ball!

name: Overcast Form
descriptionX: As a bud, it barely moves. It sits still, placidly waiting for sunlight to appear.
descriptionY: Its folded petals are pretty tough. Bird Pokémon can peck at them all they want, and Cherrim won’t be bothered at all.

name: Sunshine Form
descriptionX: After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes this form. It’s full of energy while it’s like this, and its liveliness will go on until sundown.
descriptionY: The faint scent that emanates from its full blossom entices bug Pokémon to it.

name: West Sea Shellos
descriptionX: It used to have a shell on its back long ago. This species is closely related to Pokémon like Shellder.
descriptionY: It oozes a purple fluid to deter enemies. Apparently, there are more West Sea Shellos now than there were in the past.

name: East Sea Shellos
descriptionX: A recently published research paper states that this form of Shellos is gradually decreasing in number.
descriptionY: This Pokémon can often be seen along seashores. It’s capable of spending a limited amount of time on land.

name: West Sea Gastrodon
descriptionX: Its whole body is sticky with mucus. In the past, this form of Gastrodon was by far the more numerous one.
descriptionY: It appears on beaches where the waters are shallow. Once it catches prey, it will slowly melt them with its mucus before slurping them up.

name: East Sea Gastrodon
descriptionX: They normally inhabit rocky seashores, but in times of continuous rain, they can sometimes be found in the mountains, far from the sea.
descriptionY: Fishers say that they didn’t see many of these Pokémon in the past, but this form of Gastrodon is now increasing in number.

name: Ambipom
descriptionX: In their search for comfortable trees, they get into territorial disputes with groups of Passimian. They win about half the time.
descriptionY: It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze, that’s proof it really likes you.

name: Drifloon
descriptionX: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.
descriptionY: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a “signpost for wandering spirits.”

name: Drifblim
descriptionX: It can generate and release gas within its body. That’s how it can control the altitude of its drift.
descriptionY: They carry people and Pokémon, but the wind can catch them, so there can’t be a fixed destination.

name: Buneary
descriptionX: If both of Buneary’s ears are rolled up, something is wrong with its body or mind. It’s a sure sign the Pokémon is in need of care.
descriptionY: Buneary can attack by rolling up their ears and then striking with the force created by unrolling them. This attack becomes stronger with training.

name: Lopunny
descriptionX: Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings. If danger approaches, this Pokémon responds with superdestructive kicks.
descriptionY: Once hot seasons are over, Lopunny’s coat will be replaced with fur that holds a lot of insulating air in preparation for colder weather.

name: Mega Lopunny
descriptionX: It swings its ears like whips and strikes its enemies with them. It has an intensely combative disposition.
descriptionY: Mega Evolution awakens its combative instincts. It has shed any fur that got in the way of its attacks.

name: Mismagius
descriptionX: Its cry sounds like an incantation. It is said the cry may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.
descriptionY: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.

name: Honchkrow
descriptionX: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.
descriptionY: A single cry from this nocturnal Pokémon, and more than 100 of its Murkrow cronies will assemble.

name: Glameow
descriptionX: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
descriptionY: When it’s happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.

name: Purugly
descriptionX: It would claim another Pokémon’s nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.
descriptionY: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.

name: Chingling
descriptionX: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.
descriptionY: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.

name: Stunky
descriptionX: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.
descriptionY: The foul fluid from its rear is so revolting that it can make people feel queasy up to a mile and a quarter away.

name: Skuntank
descriptionX: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.
descriptionY: It attacks by spraying a repugnant fluid from its tail, but the stench dulls after a few squirts.

name: Bronzor
descriptionX: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor’s back contained a mysterious power.
descriptionY: They are found in ancient tombs. The patterns on their backs are said to be imbued with mysterious power.

name: Bronzong
descriptionX: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.
descriptionY: It brought rains by opening portals to another world. It was revered as a bringer of plentiful harvests.

name: Bonsly
descriptionX: In order to adjust the level of fluids in its body, it exudes water from its eyes. This makes it appear to be crying.
descriptionY: From its eyes, it can expel excess moisture from its body. This liquid is similar in composition to human sweat.

name: Mime Jr.
descriptionX: It mimics everyone it sees, but it puts extra effort into copying the graceful dance steps of Mr. Rime as practice.
descriptionY: It looks for a Mr. Rime that’s a good dancer and carefully copies the Mr. Rime’s steps like an apprentice.

name: Happiny
descriptionX: It carries a round, white rock in its belly pouch. If it gets along well with someone, it will sometimes give that person the rock.
descriptionY: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It’s bothered by how curly its hair looks.

name: Chatot
descriptionX: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it’s one of them. This way they won’t attack it.
descriptionY: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

name: Spiritomb
descriptionX: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.
descriptionY: It was formed by uniting 108 spirits. It has been bound to the Odd Keystone to keep it from doing any mischief.

name: Gible
descriptionX: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.
descriptionY: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.

name: Gabite
descriptionX: In rare cases, it molts and sheds its scales. Medicine containing its scales as an ingredient will make a weary body feel invigorated.
descriptionY: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.

name: Garchomp
descriptionX: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.
descriptionY: The protuberances on its head serve as sensors. It can even detect distant prey.

name: Mega Garchomp
descriptionX: Its arms and wings melted into something like scythes. Mad with rage, it rampages on and on.
descriptionY: Its disposition is more vicious than before its Mega Evolution. Garchomp carves its opponents up with the scythes on both arms.

name: Munchlax
descriptionX: Stuffing itself with vast amounts of food is its only concern. Whether the food is rotten or fresh, yummy or tasteless—it does not care.
descriptionY: It stores food beneath its fur. It might share just one bite, but only if it really trusts you.

name: Riolu
descriptionX: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.
descriptionY: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions, such as joy and rage, in the form of waves.

name: Lucario
descriptionX: It’s said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect auras—even those of foes it could not otherwise see.
descriptionY: A well-trained one can use its aura to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.

name: Mega Lucario
descriptionX: Its aura has expanded due to Mega Evolution. Governed only by its combative instincts, it strikes enemies without mercy.
descriptionY: Bathed in explosive energy, its combative instincts have awakened. For its enemies, it has no mercy whatsoever.

name: Hippopotas
descriptionX: It shuts its nostrils tight, then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around 10.
descriptionY: It shrouds itself in sand to ward off germs. It travels easily through the sands of the desert.

name: Hippowdon
descriptionX: It is surprisingly quick to anger. It holds its mouth agape as a display of its strength.
descriptionY: It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of sand while attacking.

name: Skorupi
descriptionX: After burrowing into the sand, it waits patiently for prey to come near. This Pokémon and Sizzlipede share common descent.
descriptionY: It attacks using the claws on its tail. Once locked in its grip, its prey is unable to move as this Pokémon’s poison seeps in.

name: Drapion
descriptionX: Its poison is potent, but it rarely sees use. This Pokémon prefers to use physical force instead, going on rampages with its car-crushing strength.
descriptionY: It’s so vicious that it’s called the Sand Demon. Yet when confronted by Hippowdon, Drapion keeps a low profile and will never pick a fight.

name: Croagunk
descriptionX: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.
descriptionY: It rarely fights fairly, but that is strictly to ensure survival. It is popular as a mascot.

name: Toxicroak
descriptionX: Swaying and dodging the attacks of its foes, it weaves its flexible body in close, then lunges out with its poisonous claws.
descriptionY: It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks, the stored poison is churned for greater potency.

name: Carnivine
descriptionX: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.
descriptionY: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.

name: Finneon
